ITEM.szItemDesc: Gunfighters from Doc Holiday to Bonnie Parker have valued the wide dispersal and raw destructive power of a truncated scatter-gun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nothing else ends a gunfight (and leaves a terrible mess) faster. Get it for that special someone in your life.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Feared and respected for its range and rate of fire, the PPSh is the Tommy gun's hulking Eastern cousin. Known as the "Burp-gun" for the sound produced by its high cyclic rate, the Ppsh41 belches death at 900rpm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The muzzle flash from the AKS-74Us short barrel has singed many an eyebrow.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you're looking for a sniper system that redefines the term "HEADSHOT!", then look no further.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mikhail Kalashnikov's gift to the world has kept on giving for more than half a century of armed conflict.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Reach out and touch someone the Russian Army way.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The first M16 based carbine. The Colt 607A, or Car-15, was intended for US Special Forces fighting in Vietnam. This carbine lacks the cost (and refinements) of post A2 and M4 AR-15's.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Following a tradition of quality affordable hunting rifles, this piece is designed for human hunting.

ITEM.szItemDesc: MP5 submachine guns are basically scaled-down versions of Heckler-Koch's own G3 battle rifle. This is the basic 9x19mm MP5 with fixed stock, and four position trigger group to make it an A4.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Essentially, the VSS Vintorez is a precision development of the AS VAL. This silent sniper rifle from Russia fires heavy 9mm bullets at subsonic speeds and apparently can pierce all types of body armour at over 400 meters.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AK-100 variant fires the 5.45x39mm cartridge.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Successor to the AK-47, this select fire rifle is known for its noise and large muzzle flash.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The AKM is a modernized version of the AK-47 that entered service in 1959. Designed for mass production and supplied to even the most tenuous members of the Soviet bloc, you will find this assault rifle everywhere now.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The AEK's balanced action system improves full-auto accuracy.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The AK legend lives on, now with recoil dampening mechanism.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This ugly looking rifle delivers wounds that are equally foul.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russia's new rifle has faced controversy due to its complex design, and poor ergonomics (such as a folding stock that prevents firing). It does however have an amazing 2 round burst mechanism that delays recoil till after the last round leaves the barrel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Rys-U manufactured by TsKIB SOO has an excellent reputation for reliability. Rys, Russian for "Lynx," are RMB-93 12 gauge police/riot shotguns with civilian features such as a wooden thumbhole stock.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Modeled after the AK-47, the Saiga is a well designed and affordable semi-automatic shotgun with a host of sporting, personal defence and tactical applications.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The effect of this Russian bolt-action anti-material rifle on the enemy: a bloody mess.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Russian squad support weapon brings new meaning to the concept of 'spray and pray.'

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russia's RPD underwent four model revisions, none of which included a select fire mode.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The PKM is the Russian equivalent of the US M60.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This full-tang bowie-styled combat knife will convert you into a whirling, twirling machine of silent, subtle death.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When the enemy is too close for comfort, this full-tang bowie-styled combat knife will definitely come in handy. It features a serrated 9" blade, and a wooden handle with a heavy-duty guard and pommel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This finely balanced steel throwing knife brings new meaning to the expression killing them softly. Or, in this case, silently.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Polish up on your throwing skills with this double-edged chrome-plated high carbon steel blade. This slim little knife is a perfect choice for both novice and experienced throwers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Exactly what you'd need if you were going to cut through some cardboard. Pretty much useless in combat though.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The RGM-40 is a light-weight 40mm Russian grenade launcher with retracting shoulder stock. The RGM fires 40mm caseless VOG type grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Living proof that the "Russian concussion" wasn't just the nick-name of the foreign exchange student you dated in college. The RGM fires 40mm caseless VOG type grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M224 is a 60mm caliber lightweight mortar with a finned barrel, sight, M7 base plate, and a bipod. It was built to handle HE bombs.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Commonly referred to as the battalion commander's artillery, the M224 mortar is a must-have for the serious mercenary commandant. It is a 60mm caliber lightweight mortar with a finned barrel, sight, M7 base plate and bipod, that was built to specifically accommodate HE shells.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Perfect for digging your own grave.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This sturdy set of brass knuckles fits most hands. They will add some power to your punch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: You'll be packing a real punch with this set of handy brass knuckles. Although sturdy, they're small enough to fit into most back pockets. One size fits all.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An under barrel mounted grenade launcher for Russian made assault rifles. The GP-30 fires 40mm VOG-25 and VOG-25P grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An improved model of the GP-25, the GP-30 features a sighting reticle and a recoil buffer to protect the rifle to which it is attached. The GP-30 fires 40mm VOG-25 and VOG-25P grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This LAW replaces the RPG-22 Aglen. Used as a bunker buster as well as a light anti-armour weapon. The shaped charge (HEAT) warhead capable of armour penetration of up to 440 mm of homogenous steel armour.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This LAW replaces the RPG-22 Aglen. Used as a bunker buster as well as a light anti-armour weapon. The shaped charge (HEAT) warhead capable of armour penetration of up to 440 mm of homogenous steel armour.

ITEM.szBRName: Using this slot will cause the game to crash.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Using this slot will cause the game to crash.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 8 rounds of 9x18mm Makarov.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 9x18mm Makarov fits many more Eastern European made handguns than its namesake.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 20 round magazine for a 9x18mm chambered SMG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 20 round clip fits many Russian SMGs and machine pistols.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 8-round pistol magazine holds 9mm PM Armour Piercing rounds, which can defeat most forms of body armor at the expense of reduced wound capabilities.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 8-round pistol magazine of 9mm PM Armour Piercing bullets can hold its own even when the chips are down and the lead starts flying in earnest!

ITEM.szItemDesc: 9mm PM Armour Piercing rounds, contained within a 20-round SMG magazine, will guarantee that body armour isn't something that you should be overly concerned with.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Holding 20 rounds of 9mm PM Armour Piercing bullets, this SMG magazine will guarantee you're not unduly bothered by Kevlar or its ilk.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 12-round pistol clip features the newer 9mm PMM round with its increased muzzle velocity and armour piercing power. Not compatible with older PM guns, unfortunately.
ITEM.szBRDesc: While not compatible with older PM chambering weapons, the newer 9mm PMM round carried by this 12-round pistol clip features increased muzzle velocity and armour piercing capabilities.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This helical magazine for the Bizon contains 66 rounds of the newer 9mm PMM Armour Piercing cartridge. Alas, the bullet is not compatible with older PM firearms.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Bizon's helical magazine holds an astonishing 66 rounds of the newer 9mm PMM Armour Piercing cartridge. Alas, this round is not suitable for older weapons firing the PM cartridge or small children.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The new 9mm PMM hollow point round carried in this 12-round pistol clip has greater stopping power against unarmored opponents than its counterparts. This round is incompatible with older PM chambering firearms.
ITEM.szBRDesc: What could make you happier while walking down to the corner store than a 12-round clip of 9mm PMM hollow point ammunition, in case some of the locals get any funny ideas. This round is not compatible with older PM chambering firearms.

ITEM.szItemDesc: While probably not your first choice against armoured opponents, this Bizon 66-round helical magazine is filled with the 9mm PMM hollow point round. (Warning! This cartridge is not suitable for older PM chambering firearms!)
ITEM.szBRDesc: The 9mm PMM JHP bullets filling the Bizon's 66-round helical magazine will keep you safe even should you find your evening stroll interrupted by a rampaging mob! Unfortunately, the bullet is not compatible with older PM chambering firearms.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine contains 15 hardened steel rounds of 9mm ammunition. Even though this round easily cuts through light body armour, it doesn't cause as much damage as jacketed and regular hollow point versions.
ITEM.szBRDesc: They've got Kevlar? Have no fear with this magazine; it's brimming with 15 rounds of hardened steel. This low power pistol round is your best bet against Kevlar.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 30 hardened steel rounds are the best sub-machine gun armour-defeating ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: We searched far and wide for this round; the Armour Piercing ability of the 30-round magazine makes it the bane of all unwelcome law enforcement personnel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine contains 15 rounds of 9mm federal-135-grain hollow point ammo. While its armour piercing capabilities are questionable, its tendency to expand in tissue more than makes up for its weaknesses.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 15-round magazine of COR-BON 9mm Jacketed Hollow Point ammunition is truly the top of the line. It's a definite deterrent against any unarmored assailant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 30 rounds of federal jacketed hollow point ammunition. It combines the wound characteristics of hollow point with the penetration abilities of standard ball ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 30-round mag of 115 grain Jacketed Hollow Point ammunition is a special buy straight from COR-BON. We guarantee it will make your MP-5 the envy of any SWAT team.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Box magazine of 7.62x25mm for quiet performance.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Box magazine of 7.62x25mm for quiet performance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 71-round drum of 7.62 x 25 ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 7.62 Tk drum fits your vintage Russian SMG.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 8 rounds of 7.62x25mm hollow point.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Though a diminutive bullet, the 7.62x25mm HP doesn't lack stopping power.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Drum of expanding hollow-point ammo in .30 calibre Tokarev.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Hard hitting HP in a high capacity load-out.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 30-round magazine holds 5.45 light armour piercing anti-personnel ammo. Its metal jacketing not only improves its ability to punch through walls, but it can tear through multiple bodies as well.
ITEM.szBRDesc: One of our hottest commodities is this 30-round mag of 'acquired' Russian 5.45mm Armour Piercing ammunition. This round is guaranteed to make you the death of any party.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 45-round magazine holds 5.45 light armour piercing anti-personnel ammo. Its metal jacketing not only improves its ability to punch through walls, but it can tear through multiple bodies as well.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 75-round magazine holds 5.45 light armour piercing anti-personnel ammo. Its metal jacketing not only improves its ability to punch through walls, but it can tear through multiple bodies as well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 30-round magazine contains 5.45 jacketed hollow point ammunition. It features the combined effect of mushrooming on impact, and tumbling within its target to create enormous wound cavities.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Need a quick sure-shot way to collect on a life insurance policy? These 30 rounds of 5.45mm Hollow Point ammunition will show you the money in no time at all.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 45-round magazine contains 5.45 jacketed hollow point ammunition. It features the combined effect of mushrooming on impact, and tumbling within its target to create enormous wound cavities.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 75-round magazine contains 5.45 jacketed hollow point ammunition. It features the combined effect of mushrooming on impact, and tumbling within its target to create enormous wound cavities.

ITEM.szItemDesc: "Mini-.50" magazine for heavy anti-material rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Penetrate light armour vehicles from considerable range with a clip full of 12.7mm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Heavier than regular 9mm ammo, the 9x39mm SP-6 is a subsonic round specially designed to retain armour piercing characteristics.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The 9x39mm SP-6 is a subsonic round specially designed to retain armour piercing characteristics. This is a 10 round magazine for DMR's.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 30 rounds of Warsaw Pact issued 7.62mm anti-personnel AP ammo tend to maintain their shape on impact. Shape retention may increase its ability to defeat light body armour but it also reduces injury severity.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Looking for the perfect gift for the terrorist who has it all? Try a magazine of our surplus 7.62mm Warsaw Pact AP. It's the gift to end all gift giving.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When its time to end the fire fight, snap in a drum of hard hitting 7.62x39mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This long-serving heavy cartridge comes in convenient drums.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine contains 30 rounds of 7.62 Warsaw Pact hollow point ammo. Although use of this round against light armoured opponents can sway a battle in your favour, it's less effective against heavy armour.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ever get the urge to turn a person into a bloody sausage with legs? We recommend reaching for 30 rounds of our 7.62mm Hollow Point ammunition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This drum contains 75 rounds of 7.62 Warsaw Pact hollow point ammo. Although use of this round against light armoured opponents can sway a battle in your favour, it's less effective against heavy armour.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When killing them is simply not enough. A 75-round drum of 7.62mm Hollow Point is a great way to send the point home in true brain splattering style.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 10 rounds of long range penetrating power for the 7.62x54R chambered weapon in your collection.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 10 rounds of long range penetrating power for the 7.62x54R chambered weapon in your collection.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Fifty round belt segment of 7.62x54 full metal jacket ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fifty round belt segment of 7.62x54 full metal jacket ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 10 rounds of 7.62x51mm full metal jacket.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Great for the semi-automatic sniper rifle in your armoury.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This mag contains 20 rounds of NATO standard 7.62mm AP ammo. This round has gained favourable attention from armed forces worldwide due to its ability to penetrate a steel helmet at extreme ranges.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 7.62mm 20-round magazine is simply brimming with death, especially when it's filled with a surplus of Full Metal Jacketed rounds. This magazine makes armour more or less moot.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Dispatch adversaries without the risk of over penetration using hollow point ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Military use of hollow point ammunition was banned by the Hague Convention of 1899. User assumes all risk.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This high capacity magazine holds 20 rounds of .308 Winchester ammunition, the civilian variant of the 7.62 NATO round. It is best suited for hunting unarmored targets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If power is what you demand, more power is what you'll get with these 20 rounds of Cor-Bon Tactical .308 Winchester ammunition, the civilian variant of the 7.62x51mm round. It's more than enough power to put any problem 6-feet under.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 20 round magazine holds 5.56 mm M193 ammunition, an older 5.56 mm round that fits the old non heavy 1:12 twist barrel like the one the Car-15 uses.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Typically used for law enforcement applications, largely because some agencies fear the over penetration of the .308 round in hostage type situations, the .223 generally splinters on impact, allowing almost no excess penetration. This magazine contains 20 rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 30 rounds of NATO standard light armour piercing ammunition have the ability to tumble within its target to create a much larger wound than what is normally expected from a such small bullet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 30-round magazine is filled with our NATO standard 5.56mm. This round's steel penetrator makes it possible to beat all but the best in today's body armour.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 50 rounds of NATO standard light armour piercing ammunition have the ability to tumble within its target to create a much larger wound than what is normally expected from a such small bullet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These 50 rounds of NATO standard light armour piercing ammunition have the ability to tumble within its target to create a much larger wound than what is normally expected from a such small bullet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 30-round magazine of 5.56 Remington hollow point ammo is a variation of the civilian .223 hunting round. Like the .223, it is designed to maximize nerve shock and blood loss.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the economical choice for target shooting, hunting, or stopping potential long-range muggings. These 30 rounds of 50 grain .223 JHP can save your life and your pocket book.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 50-round belt segment of 5.56 Remington hollow point ammo is a variation of the civilian .223 hunting round. Like the .223, it is designed to maximize nerve shock and blood loss.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 50-round belt segment of 5.56 Remington hollow point ammo is a variation of the civilian .223 hunting round. Like the .223, it is designed to maximize nerve shock and blood loss.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Chamber these 12ga buckshot shells and proclaim with impunity: "This is my boomstick!"
ITEM.szBRDesc: Open up with a shower of buckshot and attackers will dissolve before your eyes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 12 gauge magazine holds 7 rounds of "00" SSG ammunition. Favoured by law enforcement personnel, it is very effective in urban firefights against unarmored opponents.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The ideal short-range man-stopper round. This 12 gauge magazine holds 7 rounds of '00' SSG ammunition. Law enforcement personnel worldwide favour this round for its effectiveness in urban firefights against unarmored opponents.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Two 12 gauge slugs for your 12 gauge slug-gun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Deer hunting or man-hunting, a pair of shotgun slugs will put the quarry down.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine contains 7 rounds of 12 gauge PolyCore slugs. Each round tears through body armour as though it were tissue paper.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is definitely the ammunition for real men only. This magazine contains 7 rounds of 12 gauge PolyCore slugs. Each round tears through body armour as though it were tissue paper.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The absolute last word in big game hunting or long range sniping, this powerful round is guaranteed to drop targets where they stand.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If this massive large bore ammo fails to terminate the target, Bobby Ray's offers a fine line of anti-tank weaponry.

ITEM.szItemDesc: For military extreme long-range anti-personnel engagements, the .338 Lapua Magnum hollow point round is king, plain and simple.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For military extreme long-range anti-personnel engagements, this 5-round clip of .338 Lapua Magnum hollow point ammunition will only serve to fuel your delusions of divinity.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 7 rounds hold .45 automatic armour piercing ammunition. Although this high velocity steel ammo may defeat most light body armour, it causes less tissue damage than lead-based rounds.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These hardened steel Armour Piercing rounds tear through Kevlar like it was butter. This 7-round magazine is known for leaving wide wound cavities.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 7-round mag of .45 ACP hollow point ammo. Its hollow point forces the round to mushroom on impact, creating a large wound channel that is wider than wounds from both standard and armour piercing variants.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you are serious about your .45 ammo, this 7-round magazine of Golden Sabre Jacketed Hollow Point ammunition is a sure-fire way to prove it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ignore the warnings to handle with caution and crack open this wooden shipping crate with a crowbar. There should be one PG-7VR Tandem Warhead rocket inside.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Boxed PG-7VR

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ignore the warnings to handle with caution and crack open this wooden shipping crate with a crowbar. There should be one PG-7VR Anti-Tank Warhead rocket inside.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Boxed PG-7VR

Internal Placeholder for Ammo 39 Explosive - Large Fragmentation
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Internal Placeholder for Ammo 38 Explosive - Tear Gas
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade creates a massive vacuum which deprives the surrounding impact area of oxygen as waves of air rush back into its core.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This grenade creates a massive vacuum which deprives the surrounding impact area of oxygen as waves of air rush back into its core. Anyone standing within the detonated area won't know what hit them as they frantically gasp for air.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade releases tactical dispersion gas that reeks havoc on exposed eyes and skin.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Guaranteed to make its victims cry like the babies they are. This grenade releases tactical dispersion gas that reeks havoc on exposed eyes and skin. It'll send everyone in its radius running for clearer pastures.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade releases a colorless, odourless, and tasteless gas that causes intense burning and blistering of the lungs. Sufferers can die without prompt medical attention.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This ain't no hot dog garnish. This grenade releases a colorless, odourless, and tasteless gas that causes intense burning and blistering of the lungs. Sufferers can die without prompt medical attention.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This small TNT loaded grenade was designed to ensure a significant throwing range and effective fragmentation. It has been proven to provide good lethal coverage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This small grenade was developed for maximum throwing range combined with effective fragmentation. The body is loaded with TNT and provides good lethal coverage. Because of its size, even women find this grenade an easy toss.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This standard army issued fragmentation grenade is packed with TNT and has a pull-ring, pressure-released firing trigger.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Your typical army issue standard fragmentation hand grenade. Jam packed with TNT, this pressure-released firing device with pull-ring, provides great lethal coverage. Stop 'em dead in their tracks, every time.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This crude homemade bomb you will have to handle with care, or it might go off when you least expect it. But if you want to do it right, you'll need to attach a simple detonator to it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Good old reliable trinitrotoluene is the second oldest and most commonly used explosive known to man-the first is dynamite. These sticks of explosives are highly stable, strawboard rolled and contain a quarter- pound charge.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Trinitrotoluene is the second oldest and most commonly used explosive known to man - the first is dynamite. These sticks of explosives are highly stable, strawboard rolled, and contain a quarter-pound charge.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Good old reliable trinitrotoluene is the second oldest and most commonly used explosive known to man-the first is dynamite. These sticks of explosives are highly stable, strawboard rolled and contain a quarter- pound charge.

ITEM.szItemDesc: REMOTE DETONATION ONLY! Safety distance: 10 squares from impact. This bag of goodies delivers, in the words of the Fifth Element, a 'Big Baddaboom!'
ITEM.szBRDesc: When you suddenly find the need to do a little creative remodelling or bridge removal, you could do far worse than the 980g of Semtex contained in this satchel charge. Remote detonator not included.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Composition C4 is a white plastic explosive that is more powerful than TNT. This plastic-covered block has a threaded-cap-well at each end. Unlike C1, its sister composition, this one's odourless.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This white plastic explosive packs a bigger punch than TNT. Composition C4 comes in a plastic-covered block with a threaded-cap-well at each end. Unlike C1, its sister composition, this one's odourless.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This HE bomb features waterproof "horseshoe" snap-off propellant increments and the M734 multi-option fuse. This fuse can be set by hand for a delayed, impact, near-surface, or proximity burst detonation.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A real man's mortar. This HE bomb features waterproof "horseshoe" snap-off propellant increments and the M734 multi-option fuse. This fuse can be set by hand for delayed, impact, near-surface or proximity burst detonations.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This anti-personnel mine is a fragmentation weapon that becomes activated when stepped on. It includes an anti-disturbance device to inhibit clearance, and a sensor that neutralizes the mine after a specified time.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Designed to stop enemies dead in their tracks, or at least slow them up a while. This anti-personnel mine is a fragmentation weapon that blows up when stepped on. It includes a built-in anti-disturbance device to inhibit clearance, and a sensor that neutralizes the minefield after a while.

ITEM.szItemDesc: REMOTE DETONATION ONLY! Safety distance: 7 squares from impact. This explosive device generates a huge amount of damage within a small area.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Claymore requires careful remote detonation, but it generates a huge amount of damage within a localized blast radius. Think of this heavy munition as a solution in search of your problems. Remote detonators sold separately.

ITEM.szItemDesc: It's an illuminating mine with a tripwire attached to it. Pull pressure or cutting the tripwire will ignite the flare, letting mercenaries know of enemy whereabouts.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This illuminating mine with an attached tripwire will shine light on the situation every time. Pull pressure or cutting the tripwire will ignite the flare, visually announcing that enemies are about.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This illuminating mine with an attached tripwire will alert mercs of nearby enemies. Pull pressure or cutting the tripwire will ignite the flare, which is followed by a loud wailing siren.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This illuminating mine with an attached tripwire will brighten up the place with a resounding roar. Pull pressure or cutting the tripwire will ignite the flare, which is followed by a wailing siren, letting nearby mercenaries know that enemies are skulking about the area.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Place this small tungsten-backed plastique explosive against any door to blow the lock right off.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Don't get left out in the cold just because you forgot your key. This trusty shaped-charge will solve all your problems. Place this small tungsten-backed plastique explosive against any door to blow the lock right off.

ITEM.szItemDesc: One time use chemical break lights are an extremely convenient and portable light source. Simply break 'n' throw to brighten your way.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These one time use chemical break lights will certainly help to lighten up those dreary night missions. Stock up on these handy little babies 'cause you'll never know when you'll need them. Simply break 'n' shake to brighten your way.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 40mm HE grenade will fit the GP-30 launcher on your Kalashnikov.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 40mm HE shell for Russian grenade launchers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Flashbangs are used to confuse and disorient a potential threat for up to five seconds. They work best indoors, and are only partially effective outdoors at night.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The flash of light from this grenade momentarily activates all sensory pigment in the retina, making vision impossible for approximately five seconds until the eye restores the pigment to its original, unstimulated state.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 40mm jumping grenade - a few hundred bucks. Grenade launcher - a few thousand. Seeing your enemies' expression once they see this little bugger merrily hopping towards them - priceless.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This nasty little device contains TNT and a little something extra that makes it explode in mid-air, spreading destruction to a wider range than a regular 40mm grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The GRD-40 Napalm grenade is essentially a tactical smoke grenade. The small explosion ignites grass and dust in the area of effect to produce a slowly dissipating cloud of smoke.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The GRD-40 Napalm grenade is essentially a tactical smoke grenade. The small explosion ignites grass and dust in the area of effect to produce a slowly dissipating cloud of smoke

ITEM.szItemDesc: When it comes to generating cover, this hand-held phosphorus-based smoke grenade is proven to be far more effective than any magazine stuffed with bullets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This hand grenade will help to fulfill a myriad a roles including: unseen advancement on enemy positions, marking possible landing sites, and wreaking havoc with fire-rangers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 199
Index 200
This kit contains: antiseptic, cotton rolls, a thermometer, iodine and mentholated vials, arm slings, safety pins, scissors, forceps, various bandages and a mini first aid manual.
ITEM.szBRDesc: From fractures to abrasions, this all-canvas kit-to-go includes everything you'll need to attend to most minor injuries. It includes: bandages, antiseptic, cotton balls, thermometers, iodine, arm slings, safety pins, scissors, and a mini first aid manual.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Aside from standard first aid supplies, this kit includes: a suture set and scissors, prep pads, a scalpel, Kelly forceps, tweezers, pain killers, anaesthetic, antibiotics, a pen light, and a surgical manual.
ITEM.szBRDesc: It's a first aid kit and then some. Aside from standard first aid supplies, this kit includes: a suture set, prep pads, suture scissors, a scalpel, Kelly forceps, tweezers, anaesthetics, pain killers, antibiotics, a pen light, and the "Emergency War Surgery" manual.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit includes: a wide range of screwdrivers, ratchets, pliers, clamps, clasps, a hammer and a sewing kit.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This kit offers every tool you'll need to repair most combat items. A wide range of screwdrivers, ratchets, pliers, clamps, and clasps are included, as well as a hammer and sewing kit.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This top-grain cowhide leather zipped case offers expert lock picking tools including: picks, shims, tension wrenches, warded master keys, a broken key extractor, and a palm-key press.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The perfect solution for getting behind locked doors and into security safes. This kit offers expert lock picking tools, including: picks, shims, tension wrenches, warded master keys, a broken key extractor, and a palm-key press, all in a top-grain cowhide leather zipped case.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Military Wood Camo Compact includes several green and brown nuanced facial paints, a mirror, and a manual on the proper use and care of your camo compact.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Military Wood Camo Compact includes several green and brown nuanced facial paints, and a mirror. This long-lasting, non-running, facial paint can be easily removed with soap and water. The kit also includes a manual that outlines the proper use and care of your compact.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Binoculars makes it possible for your team's spotter to pick out targets further away than normal during daytime ops. Equip in your primary hand to use
ITEM.szBRDesc: Binoculars makes it possible for your team's spotter to pick out targets further away than normal during daytime ops. Equip in your primary hand to use

ITEM.szItemDesc: Usually called a 'silencer' in pulpy fiction and the movies, the light, compact design of this sound suppressor can be fitted quite easily to most handguns and submachine guns.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the ideal silencer for both indoor and outdoor missions that have to be kept quiet. Its light and compact design can be fitted easily to most handguns and sub-machine guns.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 1P21 "Minuta" uses the standard night vision base clamp system, which means it will fit more than just sniper rifles. This advanced Russian long range scope features 3-9x adjustable power zoom.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The universal bipod fits most sniper and assault rifles, as well as light machine guns. Made from a die-cast aluminum, it has a coated matte finish. Its legs fold up when not in use for easy storage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Every sensible mercenary packs one of these universal bipods. It fits most sniper and assault rifles, as well as light machine guns. Made from a die-cast aluminum, it has a coated matte finish. Its legs fold up when not in use, for easy storage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Bionic Ear Scout is a high fidelity stereo amplifier headset with dual wind-resistant microphones that amplify small sounds and filter out the very loud. Its fully adjustable head strap ensures a snug fit.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Bionic Ear Scout offers advanced warning of approaching intruders. This high fidelity stereo amplifier head set features dual wind-resistant micro-phones that amplify small sounds and filter out the very loud. Its fully adjustable head strap ensures a snug fit even when on the run.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The first generation of light amplification goggles. Picture is somewhat grainy and light amplification has just begun to be researched.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The first generation of night vision gear, still available for those who cannot afford the luxury stuff.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These paramilitary eye protectors have triple-lenses: an anti-fog interior acetate lens, a tinted middle lens for reduced glare, and a scratch and shatter resistant exterior lens.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These paramilitary eye goggles feature triple-protection lenses: an interior anti-fog acetate lens, a tinted middle lens for reduced glare, and a scratch and shatter resistant exterior lens. And as an added bonus, they can be worn comfortably over prescription glasses.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Replicated from the Russian M-17A1, this rubber mask has cheek filters, scratch-proof lenses, adjustable head straps, and a drinking attachment. A vinyl shoulder bag and plastic poncho are also included.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Russian rubber mask is a copy of the American M-17A1. It has cheek filters, scratch-proof lenses, adjustable head straps, and a unique drinking attachment. It also comes with a vinyl shoulder bag, and plastic poncho to help protect you from blistering agents.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This polyethylene canteen is extremely practical. Whenever you encounter a fresh mountain spring, you can refill it again.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Any sensible mercenary would carry such a useful item with him. This water-filled polyethylene canteen is refillable and reusable so be sure to have one nearby.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is an extremely light and powerful transistorized metal detector with aural signalization. All the user has to do is have it on his person and an alarm sounds when metal is detected.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This hand-held metal detector is extremely powerful-it'll find more than just coins on the beach. It is a lightweight transistorized metal detector with aural signalization that is used most effectively by explosive detection operatives.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Use this to upgrade your Spectra Pants to Commando Pants, Spectra Vest to a Commando Vest, Commando Vest to a NCO Vest or your NCO Vest to an Officer's Vest. Also works on Dyneema armour. Produces a LBE or LBE upgrade as appropriate.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: This can be used to upgrade a Spectra Vest to a Striker Vest, or Spectra Pants to Striker Pants.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: A glass jar containing an elixir made from creature blood and Gabby's secret blend of eleven herbs and spices.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Cash, coin, moolah, dough. Whatever you call it, it'll buy you stuff.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Cash, coin, moolah, dough. Whatever you call it, it'll buy you stuff.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An empty glass jar is great for storing preserves, grandma's teeth, or anything else for that matter.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: A glass jar containing what appears to be creature blood.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: This inhalator is filled with a Crepaton stimulant that will temporarily boost your energy level. Caution: Repeated use has been known to cause cardiac arrest in some users.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: This firing device features a timer that can be set anywhere between five seconds and ten minutes to allow you to move to a position of safety before its attached explosive goes off.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Attach this baby to an explosive for real power and control. This time-delayed detonator allows you anywhere from five seconds to ten minutes to move to a location of safety before its attached explosive goes off.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Place this time-delayed firing device onto any explosive to allow you to blow up a target from a position of safety. The detonator won't ignite until you use a separate remote trigger device.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A must have for any serious explosives agent. Place this time-delayed firing device to any explosive to blow up a target when you want, from where you want. The detonator won't ignite until you hit the remote trigger.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This VHS tape entitled, 'Pant Suit Loretta 6: The Men Are Away,' is an adult XXX film. Parental and viewer discretion is advised.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: This secret Crepaton Report is sure to be incriminating, once you get past the technobabble.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Universal Daylight Laser projects a highly visible red spot at a rather significant range. In a stainless steel housing, it fits onto the trigger guard of most sub-machine guns and pistols.
ITEM.szBRDesc: You won't lose sight of your target when using one of these. The Universal Daylight Laser projects a highly visible red spot up to 100ft during the day and over 1,000ft at night.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Once the remote detonator has been placed onto an explosive, it won't ignite until you use this remote trigger device.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A must have for any serious explosives agent. Place this time-delayed firing device to any explosive to blow up a target when you want, from where you want. The detonator won't ignite until you hit the remote trigger.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Your average everyday handyman's wire cutters.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Your average everyday handyman's wire cutters. Extremely useful and versatile-don't leave home without them!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This metal object, when attached to the end of a shotgun barrel, causes buckshot fired from the shotgun to spread out along a horizontal line instead of its standard circular pattern.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Attach this metal object to the end of a shotgun barrel for a real deadly effect. It causes buckshot fired from the shotgun to spread out along a horizontal line instead of its standard circular pattern. Say good-bye to anyone who gets into its path.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Booze, spirits, swamp root, hooch. At 80 proof, drinking this stuff will definitely lead to intoxication.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Second generation night vision gear has a better intensifier than earlier models. Picture is still somewhat grainy. This type is mostly available to the public.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Whether you are a hunter, outdoorsman, or LEO, with this one no prey can hide from you in darkness.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Having already delivered the hammer of justice upon its target, this empty rocket launcher tube will live out the rest of its Dredd-ful existence as a glorified paper weight.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: One unidentified, slightly decaying, human head.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Imposter won't be imposing on anyone anymore. You're the proud owner of his slightly decaying head.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: T-Rex may be gone like the dinosaurs, but be sure to hold on to his head for posterity.

This small TNT loaded grenade was designed to ensure a significant throwing range and effective fragmentation. It has been proven to provide good lethal coverage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This small grenade was developed for maximum throwing range combined with effective fragmentation. The body is loaded with TNT and provides good lethal coverage. Because of its size, even women find this grenade an easy toss.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This standard army issued fragmentation grenade is packed with TNT and has a pull-ring, pressure-released firing trigger.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Your typical army issue standard fragmentation hand grenade. Jam packed with TNT, this pressure-released firing device with pull-ring, provides great lethal coverage. Stop 'em dead in their tracks, every time.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Teach them the hard way that flammable and inflammable mean the same damn thing.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Arguably one of Russia's most deadly exports, next to the Vodka itself, a bottle of alcohol with a cloth fuse is, like a good Vodka, simple and powerful.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Not content with simple standoff AT weapons like the RPG-7, the Soviets fielded the Ruchnaya Kumulyativnaya Granata (Handheld Shaped Charge Grenade) RKG-3M. Decades later this weapon is still a threat to modern armour.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not content with simple standoff AT weapons like the RPG-7, the Soviets fielded the Ruchnaya Kumulyativnaya Granata (Handheld Shaped Charge Grenade) RKG-3M. Decades later this weapon is still a threat to modern armour.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 405
A flare normally used for emergency purposes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Brighter than chemical lightsticks, but also comparatively short-lived, these flares can light up the night for you.

Index 408
Index 409
Index 410

This Mustard Gas bomb features waterproof "horseshoe" snap-off propellant increments and the M734 multi-option fuse. This fuse can be set by hand for a delayed, impact, near-surface, or proximity burst detonation.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Mustard Gas mortar shell features waterproof "horseshoe" snap-off propellant increments and the M734 multi-option fuse. WARNING: this item may release a noxious odour upon detonation.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Turn night into day with this 60mm illumination shell.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Turn night into day with this 60mm illumination shell.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A mortar round that delivers a WP-based smokescreen.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M722 smoke round for 60mm mortars produces a dense smokescreen wherever you need it on a battlefield. Great for covering your advance! Be careful of the smoke, though, it is based on WP, and thus may be harmful to unprotected personnel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Composition C1 is a solution of RDX and a small amount of mineral oil. This combination retains the explosive power of RDX while increasing its stability.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Composition C1 is a highly explosive solution of RDX, mixed with a small amount of mineral oil. This composition is just as effective as straight RDX, but it won't accidentally blow up in your face.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 415
HMX is a mixture of TNT and RDX at a ratio of 50/50, by weigh. Although it is not as powerful as straight RDX, it is certainly more stable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This explosive packs a real punch. HMX is a mixture of TNT and RDX at a ratio of 50/50, by weight. Although it is not as powerful as straight RDX, it is certainly more stable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 417
Index 418
A jar filled with RDX crystals is more powerful than TNT and easier to detonate. The only drawback of RDX is its instability; it can be set off by a moderate shock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A jar filled with RDX crystals is more powerful than TNT and easier to detonate. The only drawback of RDX is its instability; it can be set off by a moderate shock.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 420
This sturdy in-line stock is the benchmark for AR-15 type rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This sturdy in-line stock is the benchmark for AR-15 type rifles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This telescopic stock can be adjusted for multiple lengths, allowing you to select the best mix of manoeuvrability, speed and minimal accuracy penalty for those close-in operations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This telescopic stock can be adjusted for multiple lengths, allowing you to select the best mix of manoeuvrability, speed and minimal accuracy penalty for those close-in operations.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This aftermarket stock for AR-15, and compatible, weapons is fully adjustable for precision shooting. This stock will give you unsurpassed fit as well as felt recoil reduction.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This aftermarket stock for AR-15, and compatible, weapons is fully adjustable for precision shooting. This stock will give you unsurpassed fit as well as felt recoil reduction.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This half of the AR-15 is technically the "firearm." Contains a full automatic select-fire trigger group. Merge with an Upper Receiver to form a complete weapon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This half of the AR-15 is technically the "firearm." Contains a full automatic select-fire trigger group. Merge with an Upper Receiver to form a complete weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This half of the AR-15 is technically the "firearm." Contains a 3 round burst select-fire trigger group. Merge with an Upper Receiver to form a complete weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A large sound suppressor that can be fitted to most carbines and assault rifles. While it will reduce the muzzle noise and flash, it's still far from silent. Note that this suppressor is not for use with the current higher pressure 6.8mm SPC loadings.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A large sound suppressor that can be fitted to most carbines and assault rifles. Caution: This item is not 100 percent effective on its own. Use with cold loaded ammunition for best results. Also not recogmended for use with higher pressure loadings of 6.8mm SPC.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Quality titanium alloy sound suppressor for light intermediate rifle cartridges. Expect 20 percent better sound suppression over lesser muzzle devices. Being quite sturdy, this attachment can handle the higher pressure 6.8mm SPC loadings now in use.

ITEM.szBRDesc: The "Spetsnaz" equivalent to "Commando" Load Bearing Equipment. While unclear if it actually was in Russian SOF use at any point in time, you will appreciate the variety of pockets and effective forest camouflage pattern.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This vest has a pistol holster incorporated.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A vest with two larger pockets for carrying some big things.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Tactical Tailor Utility Vest is for those who are not primary combat soldiers, but have other duties as well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A leg rig outfitted with a medium pistol holster and a triple pistol mag pouch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Tactical Tailor Leg Rig can carry a pistol and three magazines.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A leg rig for large pistols or small machine pistols. Can carry an additional magazine.
ITEM.szBRDesc: With this Holster you can strap a small machine pistol or large pistol to your upper thigh. Has a pocket for an additional mag.

ITEM.szBRDesc: Fill this easy to carry gear bag with all the essentials to complete your Go-Bag. This tough little backpack can take any abuse you'll subject it to during your bug-out.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A backpack with lots of outer pockets.

ITEM.szBRDesc: Russian Military Paratrooper Camo RD-54 combat pack. Like many things from Russia it is generously sized.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the combat pack partner to the TIMS backpack.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The backpack part of the TIMS set. You can mount the combat pack onto it in place of the flap.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you want to carry all sorts of big things cross-country, you'll need a backpack like this one. Can be worn in conjunction with a TIMS combat pack.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Small overnight bag that can easily fit in a plane's overhead bin.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A nice hat to wear when your helmet gets too hot. Provides limited camouflage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Looking at a pile of alien amniotic fluid, my first thought wouldn't have been "Hey, I wonder if smearing this on my body armour will improve its performance?" There are rewards for creativity and improvisation after all.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This high quality ballistic vest is manufactured from 36 piles of Kevlar by Guardian Armories, Inc. It is fully adjustable and has a pocket for a ceramic armour insert.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This high quality ballistic vest is manufactured from 36 piles of Kevlar by Guardian Armories, Inc. Also available in tuxedo style for those especially dangerous formal occasions.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This high quality ballistic vest is manufactured from 36 piles of Kevlar by Guardian Armories, Inc. It is fully adjustable and has a pocket for a ceramic armour insert. Treated with Compound 18.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: this high quality Guardian Armories ballistic vest has been coated with jelly from the queen Crepitus and now provides amazing protection!
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Full Striker armour provides a lightweight combination of protection and mobility suitable for SWAT or special forces on today's urban battlefield. Now with more load hauling options.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Full Striker armour provides a lightweight combination of protection and mobility suitable for SWAT or special forces on today's urban battlefield. Now with more load hauling options.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commando Armour has been designed for those in need of superior body protection, usually commandoes and special forces. Recently upgraded to keep pace with competing load bearing armours.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Commando Armour has been designed for those in need of superior body protection, usually commandoes and special forces. Recently upgraded to keep pace with competing load bearing armours.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commando Armour has been designed for those in need of superior body protection, usually commandoes and special forces. Recently upgraded to keep pace with competing load bearing armours.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commando Armour has been designed for those in need of superior body protection, usually commandoes and special forces. Recently upgraded to keep pace with competing load bearing armours.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commando Armour has been designed for those in need of superior body protection, usually commandoes and special forces. Recently upgraded to keep pace with competing load bearing armours.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Though still working its way through the procurement system, the FLX-C 3000 with patented EFMOCS technology is now available for the enterprising security pro. This armour offers supreme protection, with little encumbrance.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Though still working its way through the procurement system, the FLX-C 3000 with patented EFMOCS technology is now available for the enterprising security pro. This armour offers supreme protection, with little encumbrance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Currently in service throughout the world with Bomb Disposal Teams, the PRO EOD Bomb Disposal Suit is a state-of-the-art garment specifically designed to give the highest level of protection with the maximum comfort and flexibility to the user.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unless you have a highly skilled explosives expert on your team, or have shares in a body bag producing company, this piece is a must for every self respecting merc.

ITEM.szItemDesc: No tourist could ever resist one of these trendy 'I love Arulco' t-shirts. Made from 100 per cent pre-shrunk cotton, it was a popular buy before the days of Deidranna.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Show your allegiance to the queen with style. Ever since she acquired power, sporting one of these 'Deidranna rules' t-shirts at government-sponsored events has become a common practice among Arulcans.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Oh Yeah? Well, same to you buddy!
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 857
The ballistic panels on these leggings are made from 28 piles of protective Kevlar. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps were designed to maintain a snug fit.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The ballistic panels on these leggings are made from 28 piles of protective Kevlar. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps were designed to maintain a snug fit without reducing mobility. These should be standard fare in every mercenary's wardrobe.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The ballistic panels on these leggings are made from 28 piles of protective Kevlar. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps were designed to maintain a snug fit. Treated with Compound-18.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Made from 28 piles of Kevlar, these leggings have been smeared with jelly from the queen Crepitus for extra protection.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: These leg protectors are made from high tensile para-aramid fibre.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Protect your lower half from small arms fire and fragmentation damage with a pair of Twaron trousers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Treatment with C-18 has augmented these leggings' ability to stop career ending knee and hip wounds.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Twaron leggings dipped in bug slime - yeah, I said it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: These Spectra Shield leggings reduces blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps won't restrain mobility.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These Spectra Shield leggings are the most body armour protection available on the market. They reduce blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps make for a snug fit without reduced mobility.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This light Spectra composite helmet, known for its anti-ballistic qualities, has an IR-absorbing black finish, cushioning foam, and an adjustable harness system with a leather head band and rubber chin strap. Treated with Compound-18.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: These Spectra Shield leggings, made from an ultra high-performance ballistic material for reduced trauma from multiple hits and angled shots, have been coated in queen Crepitus jelly for superior protection.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Produced under license by several companies, Dyneema fabric is 40 percent stronger than Kevlar.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Some wearers describe Dyneema fabric leggings as uncomfortable; however, stopping a bullet with one's unprotected groin would be considerably less enjoyable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The tensile strength of these Dyneema leggings has been improved by a treatment with Compound-18.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Complete saturation with crepitus fluid bolsters the defensive capability of these bonded armour leggings.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Full Striker armour provides a lightweight combination of protection and mobility suitable for SWAT or special forces on today's urban battlefield. Now with more load hauling options.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Full Striker armour provides a lightweight combination of protection and mobility suitable for SWAT or special forces on today's urban battlefield. Now with more load hauling options.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commando Armour has been designed for those in need of superior body protection, usually commandoes and special forces. Recently upgraded to keep pace with competing load bearing armours.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Commando Armour has been designed for those in need of superior body protection, usually commandoes and special forces. Recently upgraded to keep pace with competing load bearing armours.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Currently in service throughout the world with Bomb Disposal Teams, the EOD Bomb Disposal Suit is a state-of-the-art garment specifically designed to give the highest level of protection with the maximum comfort and flexibility to the user.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unless you have a highly skilled explosives expert on your team, or have shares in a wheelchair producing company, this piece is a must for every self respecting merc.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 873
Steel plate inserts are a common addition to Eastern European body armour. Unlike ceramics, these plates can be banged back into shape.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Steel plate inserts are a common addition to Eastern European body armour. Unlike ceramics, these plates can be banged back into shape.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Compare to steel, titanium has greater strength to mass. Unlike ceramics, these plates can be banged back into shape.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Compare to steel, titanium has greater strength to mass. Unlike ceramics, these plates can be banged back into shape.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 876

Embedded Flexible Mesh of Overlapping Ceramic "Scales" (TM) technology offers the same protection as monolithic ceramic plates, but without sacrificing mobility or comfort. EFMOCS is extremely damage resistant, and is also maintenance free.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Not just for unruly kids with skateboards and spray cans, these kneepads will prevent unwanted damage to your, you guessed it, knees.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not just for unruly kids with skateboards and spray cans, these kneepads will prevent unwanted damage to your, you guessed it, knees.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Extend the coverage down from your helmet to cover your lower jaw with this ballistic mandible attachment.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Extend the coverage down from your helmet to cover your lower jaw with this ballistic mandible attachment.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Though it looks like a sinister old fashion goalie mask (think Mike Myers), this ballistic mask is made of modern protective materials.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Though it looks like a sinister old fashion goalie mask (think Mike Myers), this ballistic mask is made of modern protective materials.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This unique upgrade kit can be used to upgrade any standard Kevlar helmet to its stealth ops counterpart.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Upgrade your helmet today! From standard Kevlar helmet to high-tech stealth operations head protection in no time! This kit includes all the necessary tools for such conversion.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This helmet will protect you from small calibre rounds effectively, providing maximal stealth. For those really quiet operatives only.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: This upgrade kit contains the necessary components and tools to convert a common Kevlar vest into the state-of-the-art Stealth Ops vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Need a suit for the next stealth mission? If you already have a standard Kevlar vest, all you need is this upgrade kit and a few minutes of your time!

ITEM.szItemDesc: With this vest an operative will remain uncovered for the most time, but vulnerable to large calibre weapons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: All you ever need to upgrade your Kevlar leggings to those used by stealth operatives.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Making too much noise while walking around? With this upgrade kit you'll mute your Kevlar leggings forever.

ITEM.szItemDesc: No need to learn ninjutsu. An operative wearing these leggings will become ninja right away.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 887
Index 888
Index 889
Index 890
This cover will make your helmet less conspicuous.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Brightly shining helmets are history! One of these camouflaged cover is a perfect upgrade for your helmet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This cover will make your helmet less conspicuous. It has additional straps which can be used to mount leaves or other greenery to it, providing better camouflage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Let the grass grow on your head! The straps on this helmet are perfect mount points for any material made by Mother nature.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Either as a companion to the Ghillie suit or on its own, the Ghillie Hood camouflages your most important piece of equipment: your head.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The finishing touch for your ghillie suit. Also useful to keep the sun out of your eyes and as mosquito net.

ITEM.szItemDesc: High Quality Jute Thread is sewn directly on to a Military BDU 4 pocket coat. The sewn on Jute thread covers the entire jacket in the front and the back, and has an attached hood.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Whether you are spying on that cute looking girl next door, or sneaking up to that perfect spot overlooking an enemy base, this vest will make sure nobody sees you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: High Quality Jute Thread is sewn directly on to Military BDU trousers. The sewn on Jute thread covers the back and the front.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unless you plan to wear jeans under your Ghillie suit, these pants are a must have if you are going for a covert approach.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Military Desert Camo Compact includes light brown, tan and white cream-based facial paint, a mirror, and a manual on the proper use and care of your camo compact.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Military Desert Camo Compact includes light brown, tan and white cream based facial paint, and a mirror. This long-lasting, non-running, facial paint can be easily removed with soap and water. The kit also includes a manual that outlines the proper use and care of your compact.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Military Urban Camo Compact includes several grey nuanced facial paints, a mirror, and a manual on the proper use and care of your camo compact.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Military Urban Camo Compact includes several grey nuanced facial paints, and a mirror. This long-lasting, non-running, facial paint can be easily removed with soap and water. The kit also includes a manual that outlines the proper use and care of your compact.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 898
Index 899
Index 900
The third generation of night vision gear is mostly used by the military. High-tech armies use milspec versions that are more rugged than earlier generation NVG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Want to see through the night as well as most American soldiers? Then this NVG is for you. With a state-of-the-art microchannel tube, you'll get the drop on everyone.

ITEM.szItemDesc: By moving the Gen III night vision tubes off to the side, and simply projecting the enhanced images on a pair of tinted see-through Heads Up Displays, these low profile goggles maximize peripheral vision, and interfere little with weapon sight usage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: By moving the Gen III night vision tubes off to the side, and simply projecting the enhanced images on a pair of tinted see-through Heads Up Displays, these low profile goggles maximize peripheral vision, and interfere little with weapon sight usage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Light amplification is not better than in generation III, but image resolution is better and halos around bright objects are reduced, resulting in a better overall picture.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from the assembly line, the first NVG of generation IV. Just what you need when a clear picture makes the difference between a dead enemy and collateral damage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Immune to light conditions, live targets will showup clearly day or night on thermal imaging. Multifunctional: handheld, goggle, and weapon sight. Just use a tool kit to store the unused head strap or weapon mounting system. (USE a Tool Kit on it to convert)
ITEM.szBRDesc: Immune to light conditions, live targets will showup clearly day or night on thermal imaging. Multifunctional: handheld, goggle, and weapon sight. Just use a tool kit to store the unused head strap or weapon mounting system. (USE a Tool Kit on it to convert)

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 905
Binoculars makes it possible for your team's spotter to pick out targets further away than normal during daytime ops. Equip in your primary hand to use
ITEM.szBRDesc: Binoculars makes it possible for your team's spotter to pick out targets further away than normal during daytime ops. Equip in your primary hand to use

ITEM.szItemDesc: Day or night, these electronic binoculars will ensure you have a clear view of distant targets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Day or night, these electronic binoculars will ensure you have a clear view of distant targets.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Survey the night battlefield with this Third Gen NV monocular. Equip in your primary hand to use
ITEM.szBRDesc: Survey the night battlefield with this Third Gen NV monocular. Equip in your primary hand to use

ITEM.szItemDesc: The near silent cooling system permits this hi-tech heat sensor to see warm bodies through most cover. Equip in your primary hand to use
ITEM.szBRDesc: The near silent cooling system permits this hi-tech heat sensor to see warm bodies through most cover. Equip in your primary hand to use

In service since 1969, the M203 is the benchmark for under-barrel grenade launcher. The standard barrel clamp and hand guard type mount requires a qualified armourer for installation. The M16/M203 combination has proven flexibility, power and range.
ITEM.szBRDesc: In service since 1969, the M203 is the benchmark for under-barrel grenade launcher. The standard barrel clamp and hand guard type mount requires a qualified armourer for installation. The M16/M203 combination has proven flexibility, power and range.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Product Improved version of the M203 fits a lot of rifles, thanks to some ingenious adapters. Its shorter, 9 inch barrel, light weight, and Quick Detach mount option allows it to be hung on a wider range of CQB weapons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Everyone wanted a M203, and now they can. The much improved M203PI does not only work with the M16, but with several European and some Israeli rifles as well. Its shorter, 9 inch barrel makes it ideal for the urban battlefields of today.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is a full size 12 inch M203 with the standard hand guard mount replaced by a Quick Detach (QD) system compatible with any sturdy RIS hand guard. Only standard size 40mm grenades may be loaded.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a full size 12 inch M203 with the standard hand guard mount replaced by a Quick Detach (QD) system compatible with any sturdy RIS hand guard. Only standard size 40mm grenades may be loaded.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 1004
When FN developed the Enhanced Grenade Launcher Module from the earlier F2000 GL1, they retained much of the superior ergonomics and quick lethality.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When FN developed the Enhanced Grenade Launcher Module from the earlier F2000 GL1, they retained much of the superior ergonomics and quick lethality.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 1006
A little known under barrel grenade launcher for Heckler & Kochs older rifles. The drop down barrel can take NATO grenades of any length.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the German equivalent to the American M203 under barrel grenade launcher. The HK79 is slightly longer and will fit only on older HK rifles. It can fire all NATO 40mm grenades on the market today or tomorrow.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Anbau-Granatwerfer 36 is an under barrel grenade launcher for most of HK's modern rifles. Does not fit the short G36C, though. AG-C/GLM mounting option allows this launcher to fit lower, "6 o'clock" tactical rails.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Need some extra firepower on your G36? This oversized pistol does the trick. Can launch all standard NATO 40mm grenades. AG-C/GLM mounting option allows this launcher to fit lower, "6 o'clock" tactical rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A long barreled standalone M203 grenade launcher mounted to a pistol grip and retractable buttstock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: KAC decided to copy Colt in making some gear that makes the M203 launcher usable without a rifle. We have decided to stock the long barreled version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If quick passage through a brick wall or a cluster of bad guys is what you need, the M79, a 40mm US grenade launcher from the Vietnam era, will terminate your troubles every time.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Known for its accuracy at longer ranges, the 40mm M79 Grenade Launcher is not your average rifle grenade. This breech loaded, single shot, break-open weapon is usually fired from the shoulder. It features a blade foresight and a folding-leaf adjustable rear sight.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This lightweight electronically fired 40mm launcher has been making the rounds at arms show demonstrating its capability.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: While the Metal Storm system is overall very lightweight, it may adversely affect the balance of your weapon. There are three 40mm grenades stuffed up front after all, but that is its main attraction.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 1013
This Russian made pump-action grenade launcher fires 43mm ordinance.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Compact and light-weight, this launcher can quickly dispense a variety of deadly payloads.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Milkor MGL six-shot 40mm grenade launcher is the world's first mass-produced multi-shot, rapid-fire 40mm hand-held weapon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Milkor MGL six-shot 40mm grenade launcher is the world's first mass-produced multi-shot, rapid-fire 40mm hand-held weapon. The MGL can fire six shots in less than three seconds, making it essential in dealing with ambush situations and in urban warfare.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Do you need to quickly fill an area with explosions, and have a plentiful supply of 40mm VOG-25 type grenades? Look no further than the RG6 for your light indirect fire needs.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Do you need to quickly fill an area with explosions, and have a plentiful supply of 40mm VOG-25 type grenades? Look no further than the RG6 for your light indirect fire needs.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the classic western recoilless launcher of the Cold War era, manufactured by neutral Sweden of course. A wide selection of 84mm ammunition is available world wide from most arms dealers.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: This multi-shot incendiary launcher is only slightly more common than the short range flamethrowers it replaced in service. Four round clip sold separately.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The USMC wanted something to take out light armour and fortified positions, they got the SMAW. You may find similar use for it too. Various rocket propelled warheads available.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The RPO-M features several improvements over the RPO-A. One such impromvements is the reusable firing unit.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Commando Mortar is a 60mm calibre mortar, slightly lighter and faster than the M224.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Commando Mortar is a 60mm calibre mortar, slightly lighter and faster than the M224.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 1022
One hit from this Light Anti-Tank Weapon is better than a one way ticket to Judgement Day. No judge, no jury, and all executioner.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M72A2 Light Anti-Tank Weapon is a light-weight shoulder-fired rocket launcher which can penetrate a foot of tank armour or destroy small battlefield fortifications. A one-shot weapon of awesome destructive power.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A top of the line RPG launcher with improved range and accuracy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The RPG-27 is a further development of rocket propelled grenade launchers, and is endowed with increased range and accuracy.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The ARWEN ACE is a break open 37mm launcher meant to fire less-than-lethal rounds. Note that less-than-lethal does not under any circumstances equate harmless.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The ARWEN ACE is a break open 37mm launcher meant to fire less-than-lethal rounds. Note that less-than-lethal does not under any circumstances equate harmless.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Now made in Canada, the ARWEN 37, or "Anti Riot Weapon ENfield" 37 is a revolver type less-than-lethal launcher developed originally in the late 1970's.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Now made in Canada, the ARWEN 37, or "Anti Riot Weapon ENfield" 37 is a revolver type less-than-lethal launcher developed originally in the late 1970's.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 1027
This rare heavy weight pump-action launcher can fire both low velocity NATO 40mm rounds as well as a hybrid round capable of higher velocities.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This rare heavy weight pump-action launcher can fire both low velocity NATO 40mm rounds as well as a hybrid round capable of higher velocities.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A dozen 40mm NATO rounds and this MM-1 will easily demonstrate that, "there is no kill like overkill."
ITEM.szBRDesc: A dozen 40mm NATO rounds and this MM-1 will easily demonstrate that, "there is no kill like overkill."

ITEM.szItemDesc: Often mistaken for a 40mm grenade launcher, this 37mm Flare launcher is popular among gun fans, especially as these are legal in most jurisdictions. In police use it allows an officer the option to employ less-than lethal 37mm riot rounds without needing to un-shoulder their primary long arm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Often mistaken for a 40mm grenade launcher, this 37mm Flare launcher is popular among gun fans, especially as these are legal in most jurisdictions. In police use it allows an officer the option to employ less-than lethal 37mm riot rounds without needing to un-shoulder their primary long arm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The HK69A1 is a break-action grenade launcher with folding stock and comfortable pistol grip. While it is equipped with sling swivels, the launcher is typically carried in a large thigh holster.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The HK69A1 is a break-action grenade launcher with folding stock and comfortable pistol grip. While it is equipped with sling swivels, the launcher is typically carried in a large thigh holster.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Silence ("Tishina") is part of the name for the BS-1 grenade launcher. Before launching, remember to operate the bolt-action to load a 5.45mm blank to drive the suppressed captive piston. Usually found on suppressor equipped AKS-74U compact assault rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Silence ("Tishina") is part of the name for the BS-1 grenade launcher. Before launching, remember to operate the bolt-action to load a 5.45mm blank to drive the suppressed captive piston. Usually found on suppressor equipped AKS-74U compact assault rifles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Instead of trying to mount a heavy 40mm launcher on their SA Vz.58 submachine guns (assault rifles), the Czechs just took their 26.5mm flare launcher and developed a fragmentation round for it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Instead of trying to mount a heavy 40mm launcher on their SA Vz.58 submachine guns (assault rifles), the Czechs just took their 26.5mm flare launcher and developed a fragmentation round for it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An experimental Polish gun from the late 1980's, this beauty is a handheld beast. With the ability to blow away opponents and cover alike, you will never want to leave home without one.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An experimental Polish gun from the late 1980's, this beauty is a handheld beast. With the ability to blow away opponents and cover alike, you will never want to leave home without one.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This muzzle device allows the firing of old style rifle grenades. Also acts as a flash hider. (Note: this attachment will allow firing and will merge with the rifle to restore it to a firing weapon. USE merger of grenade into the rifle needed to prep for firing.)
ITEM.szBRDesc: This muzzle attachment allows the firing of old style rifle grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Polish flare pistol that looks identical to one made by H&K. Fires 26.5mm flares.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Polish flare pistol that looks identical to one made by H&K. Fires 26.5mm flares.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A break open 26.5mm flare launcher typically used to fire smoke and illumination flares to attract attention, and indicate position. The CZ BRNO RV85 is popular in the US as it is non-FFL item.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A break open 26.5mm flare launcher typically used to fire smoke and illumination flares to attract attention, and indicate position. The CZ BRNO RV85 is popular in the US as it is non-FFL item.
