A six-shot clip of 20mm high explosive grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A six-shot magazine of 20mm high explosive fragmentation grenades. Fun for the whole family!

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six grenades siphon the air out of their blast radius, leaving enemies helpless on the ground.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These grenades siphon the air out of their blast radius, leaving enemies helpless on the ground.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mask your advance or cover your withdrawal with these six smoke grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Mask your advance or cover your withdrawal with these smoke grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Before deploying these six grenades indoors or in a confined space, remember: gas takes the shape of its container.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Before deploying these grenades indoors or in a confined space, remember: gas takes the shape of its container.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ever had that occasion when one mustard gas grenade just wasn't enough? Amuse your friends and alarm your enemies with not one, but 6 burstable 20mm Grenades of WWI goodness.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Take a lesson from the Central Powers in WWI and don't fire these shells into prevailing trade winds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated blast wave.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated blast wave.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated napalm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated napalm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An effective shaped charge fill is somehow crammed into this 30x71mm grenade. This round is not equipped for conversion into an ad hoc hand grenade - not that you want to get that close to enemy armour.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An effective shaped charge fill is somehow crammed into this 30x71mm grenade. This round is not equipped for conversion into an ad hoc hand grenade - not that you want to get that close to enemy armour.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30x71mm stun round is capable of causing lethal blunt trauma if not used properly.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 30x71mm baton round is capable of causing lethal blunt trauma if not used properly.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Arguably the most widely used 30x71mm grenade. Fragmentation is achieved by having notched steel wire surrounding the explosive fill. Twist off the red cap to use as an ad hoc hand grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Arguably the most widely used 30x71mm grenade. Fragmentation is achieved by having notched steel wire surrounding the explosive fill. Twist off the red cap to use as an ad hoc hand grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30x71mm grenade with a bounding fragmentation kill mechanism. On impact a small propelling charge launches the grenade into the air before the main charge goes off. Twist off the red cap to use as an ad hoc hand grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 30x71mm grenade with a bounding fragmentation kill mechanism. On impact a small propelling charge launches the grenade into the air before the main charge goes off. Twist off the red cap to use as an ad hoc hand grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Incendiary fill 30x71mm grenade. Due to wide radius of effect of the M60, a manual (hand grenade) fuzing option is not provided.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Incendiary fill 30x71mm grenade. Due to wide radius of effect of the M60, a manual (hand grenade) fuzing option is not provided.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30x71mm grenade filled with CS gas for crowd dispersal. Remove cap to expose manual fuzing option.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 30x71mm grenade filled with CS gas for crowd dispersal. Remove cap to expose manual fuzing option.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Night ops, dark cave, or deep inside an abandoned industrial facility, this 30x71mm round will light up the hunt. As this is a parachute suspended flare, this grenade cannot be hand deployed.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Night ops, dark cave, or deep inside an abandoned industrial facility, this 30x71mm round will light up the hunt. As this is a parachute suspended flare, this grenade cannot be hand deployed.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Similar to the M67A, the M67B 30x71mm grenade has a smoke obscurant fill that is impenetrable by visible light and IR sensors, but is mostly harmless to inhale. Removable nose cap conceals the manual fuze that allows hand grenade use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Similar to the M67A, the M67B 30x71mm grenade has a smoke obscurant fill that is impenetrable by visible light and IR sensors, but is mostly harmless to inhale. Removable nose cap conceals the manual fuze that allows hand grenade use.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This fragmentation grenade when fired from the 40mm grenade launcher will ignite its encased TNT after a short delay.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This standard fragmentation grenade features a time-delayed firing device to ignite its encased TNT. Fired from the Talon grenade launcher, this round can provide great lethal coverage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A High Explosive (HE) 40x46mm low-velocity grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A High Explosive (HE) 40x46mm low-velocity grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When fired from the 40mm grenade launcher, these projectiles create a massive vacuum that will leave your enemies gasping for air.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These Talon grenade launcher projectile rounds create a massive vacuum, depriving the surrounding impact area of oxygen. Anyone standing within the detonated area will be left gasping, as waves of air rush back into its core.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 40x46mm low-velocity less-than-lethal stun grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A 40x46mm low-velocity less-than-lethal stun grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Now they see you, now they don't. When properly employed, this 40mm smoke grenade will leave your opposition thinking they're dealing with Houdini himself.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When fired from a 40mm grenade launcher, this grenade will quickly release a cloud of smoke that will aid in battlefield entry or withdrawal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 40x46mm low-velocity smoke grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A 40x46mm low-velocity smoke grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This rubber-like round will disperse tear gas after a short delay. These projectiles are meant to be fired from the 40mm grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This projectile's body is made of rubbery plastic to prevent impact injuries and keep it from being picked up and thrown back. The rubber melts quickly from the heat of burning. This time-delayed round for the Talon grenade launcher releases an irritant gas when ignited.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A Tear Gas Filled 40x46mm low-velocity riot control grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Tear Gas Filled 40x46mm low-velocity riot control grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 40mm launchers can deploy this illumination cartridge much further than can be accomplished by hand.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 40mm launchers can deploy this illumination cartridge much further than can be accomplished by hand.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An illumination 40x46mm low-velocity grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An illumination 40x46mm low-velocity grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade works great for crowd control, but it tends to require more clean up afterwards than standard Tear Gas.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Thermobaric grenades provide a better kill probability than standard HE grenades. An overpressure blast uses atmospheric oxygen once the volatile liquid inside the grenade spreads and ignites.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Overpressure and heat, instead of shrapnel, is the prime killing effect of Thermobaric explosives. This novel explosive 40x46mm low-velocity grenade is modified for use in the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Overpressure and heat, instead of shrapnel, is the prime killing effect of Thermobaric explosives. This novel explosive 40x46mm low-velocity grenade is modified for use in the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A Napalm fill 40x46mm low-velocity grenade. Caution: Check range before use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Napalm fill 40x46mm low-velocity grenade. Caution: Check range before use.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A Napalm fill 40x46mm low-velocity grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system. Caution: Check range before use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Napalm fill 40x46mm low-velocity grenade reconfigured for the hi-tech Metal Storm weapon system. Caution: Check range before use.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Fired from the GM-94, the VGM93.100 is designed to take on personnel, light vehicles, and smaller fortifications. The air-fuel explosive has a well-localized impact zone, allowing use at minimal range while simultaneously ensuring the safety of both yourself and civilians.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fired from the GM-94, the VGM93.100 is designed to take on personnel, light vehicles, and smaller fortifications. The air-fuel explosive has a well-localized impact zone, allowing use at minimal range while simultaneously ensuring the safety of both yourself and civilians.

ITEM.szItemDesc: VGM93.200 is intended for non-lethal effect on rioters and criminals via an aerosol irritant gas cloud. For use in the GM-94 launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: VGM93.200 is intended for non-lethal effect on rioters and criminals via an aerosol irritant gas cloud. For use in the GM-94 launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Used defensively a GM-94 firing VGM93.300 rounds will quickly lay down an impressive smokescreen. Used offensively, this round can screen your entry for building clearing operations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Used defensively a GM-94 firing VGM93.300 rounds will quickly lay down an impressive smokescreen. Used offensively, this round can screen your entry for building clearing operations.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The GM-94 fired VGM93.400 grenade is intended to disorder criminals during antiterrorist and police missions. This is a flashbang round, so be careful to only use this before you enter a room.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The GM-94 fired VGM93.400 grenade is intended to disorder criminals during antiterrorist and police missions. This is a flashbang round, so be careful to only use this before you enter a room.

ITEM.szItemDesc: VGM93.600 is intended to prevent of mass riots, unlawful actions as well as effective physical neutralization of offenders with minimal hazard to their health.
ITEM.szBRDesc: VGM93.600 is intended to prevent of mass riots, unlawful actions as well as effective physical neutralization of offenders with minimal hazard to their health.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This shaped charge round is for the Carl-Gustaf recoilless rifle. The limited area of destruction limits its effectiveness against troop concentrations and bunkers. Tanks on the other hand should fear this warhead.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This shaped charge round is for the Carl-Gustaf recoilless rifle. The limited area of destruction limits its effectiveness against troop concentrations and bunkers. Tanks on the other hand should fear this warhead.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This high explosive round is for the Carl-Gustaf recoilless rifle. Ideally used against bunkers and other battlefield fortifications. It is moderately effective versus heavy armour.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This high explosive round is for the Carl-Gustaf recoilless rifle. Ideally used against bunkers and other battlefield fortifications. It is moderately effective versus heavy armour.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The only thing better than a napalm rocket, is four of them.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nothing's beats super-heated napalm for burning off some calories.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This FAE rocket works great for crowd control, but it tends to require more clean up afterwards than standard Tear Gas.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This FAE rocket works great for crowd control, but it tends to require more clean up afterwards than standard Tear Gas.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This large, 83mm, shaped charge round for the SMAW focuses damage in a small area. Specifically on the tank you are aiming for if all works as planned.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This large, 83mm, shaped charge round for the SMAW focuses damage in a small area. Specifically on the tank you are aiming for if all works as planned.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Mk.3 HEDP round for the SMAW is good for situations where you are not sure if you are facing tanks, bunkers or both.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Mk.3 HEDP round for the SMAW is good for situations where you are not sure if you are facing tanks, bunkers or both.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This RPG-7 tandem rocket provides a degree of lethality comparable to a 120mm artillery projectile or mortar shell. It is perfect for taking out pill boxes or otherwise entrenched targets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Guaranteed to blow your enemies away.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This RPG-7 Anti-Tank rocket carries a shaped charge warhead that is capable of defeating all known armoured vehicles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This RPG-7 Anti-Tank rocket carries a shaped charge warhead that is capable of defeating all known armoured vehicles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This slim RPG-7 round has a fragmentation warhead capable of cutting down enemy personnel over a wide radius.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This slim RPG-7 round has a fragmentation warhead capable of cutting down enemy personnel over a wide radius.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Part of the Soviet fascination with covert weapons, the BS-1 30mm grenade was propelled by a piston driven by 5.45mm blank cartridges. The Armour Piercing - Incendiary charge can render thin skinned equipment such as tactical ballistic missiles inoperable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Part of the Soviet fascination with covert weapons, the BS-1 30mm grenade was propelled by a piston driven by 5.45mm blank cartridges. The Armour Piercing - Incendiary charge can render thin skinned equipment such as tactical ballistic missiles inoperable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the seven round magazine for the rare Polish 40x47mm Pallad-M grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the seven round magazine for the rare Polish 40x47mm Pallad-M grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Flashbangs are used to confuse and disorient a potential threat for up to five seconds. They work best indoors, and are only partially effective outdoors at night. These projectiles are fired from the 37mm ARWEN launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Flashbangs are used to confuse and disorient a potential threat for up to five seconds. They work best indoors, and are only partially effective outdoors at night. These projectiles are fired from the 37mm ARWEN launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Now they see you, now they don't. When properly employed, this 37mm smoke grenade will leave your opposition thinking they're dealing with Houdini himself.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When fired from a 37mm grenade launcher, this grenade will quickly release a cloud of smoke that will aid in battlefield entry or withdrawal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Remember, at a certain point these plastic baton rounds will go from less-than-lethal to just lethal. These projectiles are fired from the 37mm ARWEN launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Remember, at a certain point these plastic baton rounds will go from less-than-lethal to just lethal. These projectiles are fired from the 37mm ARWEN launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When fired from the 37mm grenade launcher, these projectiles create a massive vacuum that will leave your enemies gasping for air.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These ARWEN launcher projectile rounds create a massive vacuum, depriving the surrounding impact area of oxygen. Anyone standing within the detonated area will be left gasping, as waves of air rush back into its core.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This rubber-like round will disperse tear gas after a short delay. These projectiles are meant to be fired from the 37mm ARWEN launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This projectile's body is made of rubbery plastic to prevent impact injuries and keep it from being picked up and thrown back. The rubber melts quickly from the heat of burning. This time-delayed round for the ARWEN riot launcher releases an irritant gas when ignited.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Let there be light. This 37mm launcher launched flare will quickly ruin enemy night ops plans.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Let there be light. This 37mm launcher launched flare will quickly ruin enemy night ops plans.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 37mm smoke grenade has been modified to disperse a flamable liquid. Hopefully the rag coveringthe igniter will be enough to set it off
ITEM.szBRDesc: When fired from a 37mm grenade launcher, this grenade will quickly release a cloud of smoke that will aid in battlefield entry or withdrawal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is basically a Czech 26.5mm launcher flare loaded with a fin stabilized fragmentation grenade instead of smoke or illumination payload.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is basically a Czech 26.5mm launcher flare loaded with a fin stabilized fragmentation grenade instead of smoke or illumination payload.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These are 26.5mm Czech Military Black Smoke Flares. These flares can be used for signaling or concealment.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These are 26.5mm Czech Military Black Smoke Flares. These flares can be used for signaling or concealment.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These are 26.5mm Czech Military Illumination Flares. These flares can be fired in any 26.5mm flare gun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These are 26.5mm Czech Military Illumination Flares. These flares can be fired in any 26.5mm flare gun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Bullet trap equipped Anti-Tank rifle grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Bullet trap equipped Anti-Tank rifle grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Bullet trap equipped Anti-Personnel rifle grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Bullet trap equipped Anti-Personnel rifle grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Now they see you, now they don't. When properly employed, this large smoke grenade will leave your opposition thinking they're dealing with Houdini himself.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Now they see you, now they don't. When properly employed, this large smoke grenade will leave your opposition thinking they're dealing with Houdini himself.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Bullet trap equipped chemical dispersal round filled with CS (Tear Gas) for large scale crowd control.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Bullet trap equipped chemical dispersal round filled with CS (Tear Gas) for large scale crowd control.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade releases a colorless, odourless, and tasteless gas that causes intense burning and blistering of the lungs. Sufferers can die without prompt medical attention.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This ain't no hot dog garnish. This grenade releases a colorless, odourless, and tasteless gas that causes intense burning and blistering of the lungs. Sufferers can die without prompt medical attention.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Bullet trap equipped illumination rifle grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Bullet trap equipped illumination rifle grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Bullet trap equipped White Phosphorus grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Bullet trap equipped White Phosphorus grenade.

A magazine holds five 19x36mm DM13 signal flare cartridges. Designed for the EFL launcher as signal or illumination flare.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A magazine holds five 19x36mm DM13 signal flare cartridges. Designed for the EFL launcher as signal or illumination flare.

Shorter than a machete, but larger than most military knives.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The KaBar Cutlass is easier to handle than a machete, and looks more like the Nepalese Kukri, favoured weapon of the famous Gurkha warriors.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This knife has a hole in the blade that works in conjunction with the end of the sheath to facilitate wire cutting.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a knife-version of Eickhorns KCB 77 M1 bayonet with wire cutting ability.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A small, well-balanced knife.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A small, well-balanced blade that does a little less damage that our standard combat knife, but can be swung a bit faster.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A great big knife that looks like it came straight out of a Rambo movie. This thing looks big enough to use as a makeshift crowbar.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A great big knife that looks like it came straight out of a Rambo movie. Comes with "Entrail-Away" cleaning fluid.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Now that's a knife!
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Top of the line, this knife is corrosion resistant and keeps an edge forever.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Pearl Harbor seems to have been forgotten even by the toughest soldiers there are, as this knife for the U.S. Navy Seals is made in Japan.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A poor man's substitute for a decent knife. Looks like nobody bothered to wash it after eating with it either.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pry open locks and stab your enemies with this all purpose utility knife.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Pry open locks and stab your enemies with this all purpose utility knife.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This limited edition, Sam Garver combat knife, is authenticated with a serial number and signed by Sam himself. It's galvanized steel blade and gator-skinned elegance have made it a highly sought-after collectable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: From formal wear to fatigues, this highly versatile umbrella will accompany you anywhere in style. It is also extremely durable; boasting a teflon-treated cloth guaranteed to withstand hail and sleet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This heavy steel throwing knife brings new meaning to the expression killing them softly. Or, in this case, silently.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For experienced knife-throwers only! This heavy blade is guaranteed to punch even the heaviest of armour, but its weight makes it a little awkward for newbies.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A heavy throwing knife with a double-edged, chrome-plated, high carbon steel blade that is covered in blood.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: This knife has a hole in the blade that works in conjunction with the end of the sheath to facilitate wire cutting.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a knife-version of the AK Bayonet with wire cutting ability.

Index 1315
Made of modern materials the Axe has returned to the battlefield ready to be both weapon and tool.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, The computer code you have suplied has given us information regarding Tyrone Banks, a small time hood from the lower end of the Bronx, New York. Mr.Banks has been arrested multiple times for such offences as Armed Robbery, Grand Theft Auto, the
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: A34875 Email To:T.Banks - From:P.Klaus Jr. - RE:New Plans
ITEM.szItemDesc: Tyrone, I am FURIOUS with the results I have received from your colleagues. I demand that you complet the assignment that those incompetens faild at. - Upon your completion, report to the small island of El'Nueve located southeast of your location. Confir
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card allows access to the Queen's Mainframe Computer System.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, This key card has unlocked information on General Simon Krott, apparently someone you may have exonerated on your last mission to Arulco. : Originally loyal to the country of Arulco, his views began to change in the last few months when the Deidranna resurfaced. According to in friends, he believed Diedranna to be immortal and therefore worthy of allegiance. [SEE ATTACHED]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: B35462 Email: To: Simon Krott - From: Queen Deidranna - RE: Security
ITEM.szItemDesc: General, As you are probably aware all has not gone as planned in our campaign to rid the country of these subversives that Enrico Chivaldori left when he fled again. I charge you and your men to stop these insurgents with whatever means necessary. - I have it on good authority that they will be attacking your stronghold in Alma on their way south to Balime. [Continued Over]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: They must not ever reach Balime nor find out about the involvement of our friends in the Twin Peeks Village West of your location. - Rid me of this thorn in my side and there will be a cabinet position awaiting your in Meduna. Fail me and there will be a twentyone gun salute at your funeral! - Your Supreme Commander, Queen Deidranna [END OF REPORT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, this computer code has supplied us with information on Jack Remington, a Wise Guy" originally associated with the Infamous Soprano Family. Mr Remington was removed from his offica as "Captain" by Tony Soprano himself due to, unorthodox dealings with associates. This is the first time he has resurfaced sice his ban from the US. [SEE ATTACHED]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: H69584 Email To: J.Remington - From: P.Klaus Jr - RE:New Plan
ITEM.szItemDesc: Jack, Our reports have been confirmed that the Rebels have found outside assistance. Some of your colleagues have not been sucessful in eliminating this threat. We have word that they are in your area and may attempt to conquer Chitzena and/or Etu Island located sout of you. DO NOT let this happen! [continued]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: As an added incentive, should you fail to fulfill your contract, I will personally see that your entire family will suffer long and painful ends to thier miserable existence. -- FAIL ME NOT! -- your Honorable Leader, Peter Klaus Jr. (END OF REPORT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, The Computer Code you have supplied has given s acces to information regarding Olga Statova, a Hired Assassin in the underground military o Arulco. == Although little information is known were were able to confrim her identity and access information on the Queen's Servers. [See Attached Email]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: J87434 Email To: Olga Statova - From: Peter Klaus Jr. - RE: New Plans [1/3]
ITEM.szItemDesc: Olga, my negotiations with this Rebel Militia Instructor grow weary. She speaks of "honor" and "loyalty" but offers no monetary value in return. How dare they insult me after their disloyalty and lack of honor led to the cold-blooded murder of my father?
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: I have dismissed her back to her Rebel Cause informing her my people will remain "neutral". However, I have spoken with Elliot at the Palace and he offers a much more... lucrative alternative to this conflict. Another meeting has been arragned to let them know just what the cost of allegiance to hsi dear Queen will cost.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Report to Omerta immediately. I have reason to believe the Rebels have requested outside assistance. If this is true, eliminate them, leave no survivors. If you can locate this Rebel base, destroy it. No one must remain to implicate me in these matters. Contact me upon your completion. == Your Honorable Leader, Peter Klaus Jr. [END OF REPORT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, This key card has revealed more on Deidranna's new weapon. It now appears that a prototype is in fact complete! We cannot express the importance of recovering the plans for this weapon. However GDN is now authorizing you to destroy the weapon, should you be unable to recover the plan. [SEE ATTACHED]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: K87765 Email To: Queen Deidranna - From: Elliot Morris - RE: Prototype Ready!
ITEM.szItemDesc: Your Majesty, Your scientists have completed the prototype for your new weapon. It will be available for you at your earlist convenience. I am certain you will be pleased. The prototype is functioning as planned however, the scientists say it may be some time before more can be produced since funding has been cut due to the advaning mercernaries. - Your humble servant, Elliot [END OF REPORT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, The Computer Code you have supplied has given us extreme cause for concern. It would appear that the Queen is working on some type of new weaponry. Should this be true, it would be in all our best interests if you find this weapon and return it to our scientists for further study. The following has been retrieved per the supplied code [Attachment]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: L23564 To: Peter Klaus Jr. - From: Queen Deidranna - RE: Something of Interest
ITEM.szItemDesc: My Dear Peter,I was very sorry to hear of the problems you encountered at the San Mona Mine. It is unfortunate that the Rebels insisted on gaining control of those minerals. I'm sure you realize, I just couldn't let that happen.[1/3]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: However, I have been informed that you may have access to weapon shipments entering Arulco. I may be interested in obtaining some of these weapons from you. I'm certain we could work out a beneficial arrangement for the both of us.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: As an added incentive, my scientists are working on a very powerful weapon, a weapon so powerful, that tragedies such as the San Mona Mine would never have to happen again. I will have Elliot contact you regarding your shipments, should I be interested in obtaining some, I will reward you well. == Your Beloved Queen, Deidranna [END OF REPORT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, this computer code has given us information on Elliot Morris, the Queen's personal assistant in the Arulco Conflict. Based on the recovered Journal Entries, it appears that Mr Morris is the one who conceived the idea to resurrect Queen Deidranna for his own, personal reasons. [SEE ATTACHED]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: I know what we are about to do violates every fabric of nature itself, however, I cannot bear to live without my beloved Deidranna. Seeing her mutilated body lay there in the pool of her own blood tore my heart from my chest. I can only hope we will be forgiven for what we are about to do.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: So much has happened in so short a time. I am so glad that Madlab was successful in restoring my Dear Queen's health. Although she is not yet herself, Madlab assures me she will regain all her memories and adoring personality traits. I cannot express the joy I feel today.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: My beloved is once again healthy as ever before and wishes to regain what was take nfrom her a year ago. She does not want to flee Arulco as I have suggested but rather crush all that stands before her. I will stay at her side as I have always done before, she is my Queen, she is my love.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: My Queen has retaken Meduna! And to my wonderful surprise Enrico himself has been captured and sentenced to death. Although she hides it well, I know the happiness and joy she feels inside, or I too could be no happier than I am today. Long live Deidranna's Reign!
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: It is so joyous to see the peasants of the country hide in fear. Just the thought of Queen Deidranna back on the throne has caused much of the resistance to flee in fear. Yes! Yes! my Queen has taken Arulco once again! We will be so happy I just know it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: I thought it would be bliss until word ofthe Rebel's attack on San Mona arrived today. My Queen is furious and has instructed me to offer Kingpin Jr. anything he wants to eliminate them. I have contacted Kingpin Jr. and he has sworn to kill them all, and then it will be all right.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Kingpin has informed me of his meeting with the Militia Instructor who has told him that Enrico is still alive! I prey my beloved does not find this out, she will be furious and her wraith will be devastating. Kingpin also fears the Rebels may gain outside assistance. The nightmare begins again...
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Those Mercenary Bastard have attacked Drassen and shot my beloved again! Thank God our spies were able to get her remains to Madlab in time, he had to work quickly to regenerate the destroyed tissue. But I do not trust him, I have instructed our scientists to lean his techniques, just in case.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: My Queen is back on her throne, however she is not pleased that the mines are still failling into the Rebel's hands even though we have trapped them to explode. She seems different this time, more aggressive, more determined than ever to kill all that stand in her way.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Kingpin's Foreign Terrorists have not been receiving their payments as planned. It seems these mercenaries scum have been intercepting our deliveries as though they are eading our encrypted messages, but that is impossible. They don't have that type of technology.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Our supply drop was raided yesterday by the new arrivals and heavy casualties taken by our side. I fear things are not going as well as my beloved believes. She will not heed my warnings to escape now while we still have control of most major cities.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: A former AIM Mercenary Michael "Mike" Backstab was hired to train an Elite Force to combat these rebel guerillas. My beloved is confident he will perform without flaw, I hope she is correct. I cannot bear to see her hurt again.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Deidranna was shot a second time but after she recovered she insisted on going back out into the field. I fear she believes that she cannot be killed, what has become of her.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Kingpin's men have failed miserably, the "Faction" was overrun and now the Queen is furious and looking for the Rebellion herself! Oh my God, what have I done.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Deidranna has been shot AGAIN and we almost weren't able to gether lifeless body back to the cloning laboratory in time to resurrect her. I pleaded with her to stay in the palace but she won't hear of it. SHE THINKS SHE IS A GOD!
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The shooting has come to Orta. I fear this will be my last entry in this journal. If they find the lab down here we won't be able to clone any more Queens. I beg God to have mercy on our souls for what we have done!!!
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, The Computer Code you have supplied has given us access to information regarding Olaf Helinski, another Hired Assassin in the underground military of Arulco. [continued]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Apparently Oalf has had a long acquaintance with the Klaus Family. His record go all the way back to the early 1990's where he assisted Peter Klaus Sr. in the takeover of San Mona, Arluco. - It appears he is still close to the family based on the following email message recovered with this code. [Attachment]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: R67665 Email To: Olaf Helinski - From: Peter Klaus Jr. - RE: New Plans [1/2]
ITEM.szItemDesc: Olaf, Report to Drassen and await the Queen's arrival. She will be giving you a Security Access Card which will shed some light on this new weapon that Elliot has been speaking of.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Before Returning to San Mona, stop at our friend's shipment yard on the rous southwest of Drassen. DO NOT provoke them in any way; simply request the delivery date of our shipment to San Mona. ==== your Honorable Leader, Peter Klaus Jr. [END OF REPORT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, the computer card you have supplied has given us information on Ray Baker, also known as the "Terror of Tracona". For the past year, Mr.Baker has been working with the Tracona Government to regain control of the producing mines in Arulco. We had assumed he ws killed during your last mission. [SEE ATTACHMENT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: T77552 Email To:Ray Baker - From:Peter Klaus Jr. - RE:New Plans
ITEM.szItemDesc: Raymond, Your comrades have failed me with such a simple task of defeating these Mercenary Dogs! I expect YOU to fulfill our contract now. If they enter Balime, DESTROY THEM! I will no longer tolerate this insubordination, kill them or I will KILL YOU! - Upon you completion, contact Darryl Hicks in your area and pick up our supplies and return them to San Mona. - [continued]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Raymond, if you fail me... I would suggest you coward back to tracona. Otherwise, your screams will be heard across the entire country. - Your Honorable Leader, Peter Klaus Jr. [END OF REPORT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Encryption Code on this Key Card has been transmitted to the GDN. Check the Laptop Files Section for more information.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commander, the computer code you have supplied has given us more information on Deidranna's new weapon. It would appear that it is not complete yet. Once again Commander, it is imperative that you find the location of this weapon and bring back the plans for its construction. [See Attached Document]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szLongItemName: U86754 Email To: Queen Deidranna - From: Elliot Morris - RE: New Weapon Update
ITEM.szItemDesc: Your Majesty, Development still proceeds on your new weapon. Our scientists have made several major accomplishments since our last update. Although the weapon is still far from completion, they are confident you will be very pleased with the results. I trust you will want to evaluate it as soon as the prototype is available. == Your humble servant, Elliot [END OF REPORT]
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: Or 'Freedom Fries', as some people like to call them.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, baked beans, spam, spam, spam and spam.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A viking's favourite food.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, lovely spam, wonderful spam!

ITEM.szItemDesc: A true Assassin's choice. The slightest skin contact will kill the target in under a minute. No salvation possible.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Yo man, we jsut got these ultracool poison darts. This'll kill an elephant! Just be careful not to touch this by accident, like poor Jimmy from the export department.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In skilled hands, a deadly weapon. In unskilled hands, you better use your fists.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Part of the uniform of Arulco's elite guard. Pretending to be one of them carries the death penalty.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR

ITEM.szItemDesc: A totally unremarkable blue T-shirt.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Apparently we sell clothes now. Well, this is a T-shirt, you know?

ITEM.szItemDesc: A totally unremarkable brown T-shirt.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Apparently we sell clothes now. Well, this is a T-shirt, you know?

ITEM.szItemDesc: A totally unremarkable green T-shirt.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Apparently we sell clothes now. Well, this is a T-shirt, you know?

ITEM.szItemDesc: A totally unremarkable grey T-shirt.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Apparently we sell clothes now. Well, this is a T-shirt, you know?

ITEM.szItemDesc: Part of the uniform of the armed administrative branch of the Arulcan Army.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A totally unremarkable white T-shirt.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Apparently we sell clothes now. Well, this is a T-shirt, you know?

ITEM.szItemDesc: A totally unremarkable purple T-shirt.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Apparently we sell clothes now. Well, this is a T-shirt, you know?

ITEM.szItemDesc: Warning: Wearing this while talking increases your death risk tremendously.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Warning: Wearing this while talking increases your death risk tremendously.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Jean. What kind of colour is 'jean' anyway? Stupid colour names. In my days, you wore black and that was it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A totally unremarkable light green yellow T-shirt.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Apparently we sell clothes now. Well, this is a T-shirt, you know?

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pants. Be sure to wear a pair if you leave the house.
ITEM.szBRDesc: We also sell pants. In beige. Sigh. What has this shop come to? Does anyone even read this?

ITEM.szItemDesc: Part of the arulcan elite guard uniform.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A pair of no-name bluejeans.
ITEM.szBRDesc: You know, I used to wear them before they were cool.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Standard army pants.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pants. This might be useful, don't you think?
ITEM.szBRDesc: 42 little jeans had to lose their skin to create this jean pair of pants. So please buy it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pants. Of limited use as a weapon, if you ask me. But you propably don't, I know you.
ITEM.szBRDesc: We are not sure what this has to do with a tan, but please buy them anyway.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 1623
Index 1624
If you want to arrest someone, it is helpful to keep them from using their hands.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard police handcuffs.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If applied correctly, this stun gun will hit anyone it touches with over 2 million volts. In case you find yourself in need of a drooling, helpless victim.
ITEM.szBRDesc: At 2 million V, this baby will leave even the sturdiest men helpless on the floor. Batteries not included!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Well, its better than flailing your ams helplessly.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Repel any thug with this pepper spray. Spray into his face for best effect.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you think you need to carry several of these, consider moving out of town.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Though one might think so, putting this on your food is not the best idea you could have.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This mask, in conjunction with a diving bottle, allows you to stay underwater.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Whenever you feel you could go down, be sure to protect your eyes and retain vision with one of these.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Contains enough oxygen to stay underwater for many minutes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard equipment for divers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: What you'll lose in maneuverability on land you'll gain in water.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not only can you swim much faster with these, you'll also be the star of every penguin-themed costume party.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Surprisingly, this also works on people, as a very poor man's handcuff.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Useful for sorting your cables. This stack should be enough for your office.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A hundred insanely poisonous darts. Why do you need so many?
ITEM.szBRDesc: We are now providing several types of ammunition in bulk. Please note the prices and weights of ammunition crates before purchasing.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A very strong animal tranquilizer. Lethal if overdosed, and you are not an elephant.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Laser Aiming Module and tactical flashlight combination is meant to fit on modern rifle rail interface systems. Flashlight is ON.
ITEM.szBRDesc: *** Not available from BR's. Please report this bug. ***

ITEM.szItemDesc: I am... the light! No wait, that ain't right. I'm just a flashlight. But I'm still useful. If everything else fails, use me to knock people over the head.
ITEM.szBRDesc: We say: let there be light! Batteries included.

ITEM.szItemDesc: I am... the light! No wait, that ain't right. I'm just a flashlight. But I'm still useful. If everything else fails, use me to knock people over the head. Flashlight is ON.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An official USPS letter opener. Boldly engraved on the handle is the warning property of the government - "do not remove from postal station".
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An effective implement used for prunning.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not for sale through BR.

This leg rig is covered with webbing compatible with most Modular-Load Bearing Equipment (M-LBE) systems. The oversized tiny pocket is almost an after thought.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This leg rig is covered with webbing compatible with most Modular-Load Bearing Equipment (M-LBE) systems. The oversized tiny pocket is almost an after thought.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This premium M-LBE chest rig has five double AR-Magazine pockets, and a pair of sizable built-in pocket.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This premium M-LBE chest rig has five double AR-Magazine pockets, and a pair of sizable built-in pocket.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Modular-LBE chest rig has four magazine pockets for a single large Battle Rifle magazine. The webbing is compatible with all major types of modular LBE pouches.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Modular-LBE chest rig has four magazine pockets for a single large Battle Rifle magazine. The webbing is compatible with all major types of modular LBE pouches.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This basic Modular LBE (M-LBE) chest rig has three pockets for AK, and other oversized, magazines. Two extra pockets for your keys and credit cards.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This basic Modular LBE (M-LBE) chest rig has three pockets for AK, and other oversized, magazines. Two extra pockets for your keys and credit cards.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This premium M-LBE chest rig has numerous tiny pockets and a flashlight pouch to go along with the modular pouches. Generally police have pouches for pistol magazines and a few small pockets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This premium M-LBE chest rig has numerous tiny pockets and a flashlight pouch to go along with the modular pouches. Generally police have pouches for pistol magazines and a few small pockets.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A basic combat pack covered in webbing compatible with most modular load bearing equipment systems.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A basic combat pack covered in webbing compatible with most modular load bearing equipment systems.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In addition to the M-LBE webbing, this is the Combat Pack is part of a complete load bearing system.
ITEM.szBRDesc: In addition to the M-LBE webbing, this is the Combat Pack is part of a complete load bearing system. Make sure you pick up the matching backpack from Bobby Ray's.

ITEM.szItemDesc: M-LBE pouches fit all major modular webbing systems, and even some belts. This is the largest general purpose pocket that you'll want to have attached to the front of your chest rig. Two additional tiny pockets increase its versatility.
ITEM.szBRDesc: M-LBE pouches fit all major modular webbing systems, and even some belts. This is the largest general purpose pocket that you'll want to have attached to the front of your chest rig. Two additional tiny pockets increase its versatility.

ITEM.szBRDesc: M-LBE pouches fit all major modular webbing systems, and even some belts. The canteen pocket is big enough to contain many tiny items or one medium sized item, like a canteen. Also has two internal pockets for keys and credit cards.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is not a functional weapon, it will not fire during combat turns. Unload this item and merge with any AR-15 / M4 / M16 type weapon to produce the weapon named.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Convert any surplus AR-15 rifles to fire the powerful .50 Beowulf round with this upper receiver. - Lower Receiver and Magazines sold separately

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AK copy is not the most stable firing platform.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Despite being devoid of the trademark wood, this gun begs the question: "Does the world really need another Kalashnikov knockoff?" Our answer is an emphatic "Yes".

ITEM.szItemDesc: The AMD-65 is a widely used AK clone, and is often upgraded with western components by many users. This one has been fitted to use a wide variety of modular tactical shoulder stocks.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The AMD-65 is a widely used AK clone, and is often upgraded with western components by many users. This one has been fitted to use a wide variety of modular tactical shoulder stocks.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Developed in the 1960s, the American-180 trades single shot power for the ability to unleash a torrent of small bullets. The integral laser sight is a more recent option for this high capacity weapon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Developed in the 1960s, the American-180 trades single shot power for the ability to unleash a torrent of small bullets. The integral laser sight is a more recent option for this high capacity weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The integral grip on the American-180 Short helps to keep it on target during automatic fire. With such a weak round, it is only effective in long bursts and only if it those shots hit the same target.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The integral grip on the American-180 Short helps to keep it on target during automatic fire. With such a weak round, it is only effective in long bursts and only if it those shots hit the same target.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Not many pistols are chambered for .22 Magnum, so it is a good thing that the AMT Automag II recently started being produced again.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not many pistols are chambered for .22 Magnum, so it is a good thing that the AMT Automag II recently started being produced again.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This unmodified Automag III is chambered for .30 Carbine. Be sure to wear hearing protection when plinking with this heavy round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This unmodified Automag III is chambered for .30 Carbine. Be sure to wear hearing protection when plinking with this heavy round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 4138
A large pistol in .45 Winchester Magnum calibre, made by Galena Industries.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The .45 Winchester Magnum version of Galena's line of Automag pistols.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Automag has been modified into a monster of a pistol which fires .50AE.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Automag has been modified into a monster of a pistol which fires .50AE.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Made in the 1980's by Arcadia Machine & Tool, the AMT Hardballer Longslide has an extended 7inch barrel. It is otherwise a clone of the M1911, though parts may not be interchangeable with other M1911 pattern pistols.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Made in the 1980's by Arcadia Machine & Tool, the AMT Hardballer Longslide has an extended 7inch barrel. It is otherwise a clone of the M1911, though parts may not be interchangeable with other M1911 pattern pistols.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russia's new rifle has faced controversy due to its complex design, and poor ergonomics (such as a folding stock that prevents firing). It does however have an amazing 2 round burst mechanism that delays recoil till after the last round leaves the barrel.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Funding problems have slowed deployment of this new assault rifle in Russia; allowing it to be available here for enterprising security types. Like the fable G11, the AN-94 can get a burst off before recoil is felt.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Once a near myth, the Ares Shrike is finally available for the security professional in need of lightweight firepower.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Once a near myth, the Ares Shrike is finally available for the security professional in need of lightweight firepower.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This upper reciver is an economical way to own the near mythical Ares Shrike.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Before the M16 there was the AR-10, a battle rifle ahead of its time. In the 1950s a small number were produced for foreign military sales - this one dates from that time, giving you select fire.Modern parts have been added, maintaing its tactical utility but ruining its antique value.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Before the M16 there was the AR-10, a battle rifle ahead of its time. In the 1950s a small number were produced for foreign military sales - this one dates from that time, giving you select fire.Modern parts have been added, maintaing its tactical utility but ruining its antique value.

ITEM.szItemDesc: While the AR-18 never took off as a lower cost alternative to the M16, its mechanism lives on in several modern rifles. New production AR-180 can accept STANAG magazines, but lack the folding stock. This one also happens to be select fire like the originals.
ITEM.szBRDesc: While the AR-18 never took off as a lower cost alternative to the M16, its mechanism lives on in several modern rifles. New production AR-180 can accept STANAG magazines, but lack the folding stock. This one also happens to be select fire like the originals.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 4159

In production through various manufactures since 1959, the AR-7 Survival Rifle is a Bond gadget that can actually be bought off the shelf. When disassembled, the AR-7 can be packed into its waterproof stock for storage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: In production through various manufactures since 1959, the AR-7 Survival Rifle is a Bond gadget that can actually be bought off the shelf. When disassembled, the AR-7 can be packed into its waterproof stock for storage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Armat's M41A is an air cooled, gas-operated pulse-action assault rifle which uses a 10mm caseless cartridge. For even more firepower, the rifle sports an underslung 30mm pump-action grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Armat's M41A is an air cooled, gas-operated pulse-action assault rifle which uses a 10mm caseless cartridge. For even more firepower, the rifle sports an under slung 30mm pump-action grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Hose down a room full of enemies in utter and deadly silence.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The tactical applications of a silenced assault weapon are limited only by the imagination (and moral inclinations) of the user.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Hose down a room full of enemies in utter and deadly silence.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Unlike the original SR-3 Vikhr, the SR-3M can easily have a silencer mounted. In some ways this 9x39mm carbine is more versatile than the AS VAL it was developed from.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unlike the original SR-3 Vikhr, the SR-3M can easily have a silencer mounted. In some ways this 9x39mm carbine is more versatile than the AS VAL it was developed from.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Essentially, the VSS Vintorez is a precision development of the AS VAL. This silent sniper rifle from Russia fires heavy 9mm bullets at subsonic speeds and apparently can pierce all types of body armour at over 400 meters.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Essentially, the VSS Vintorez is a precision development of the AS VAL. This silent sniper rifle from Russia fires heavy 9mm bullets at subsonic speeds and apparently can pierce all types of body armour at over 400 meters.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This tac rail covered bullpup monster is supposed to be a CQB or Urban warfare weapon. Note that the Ash-12.7 does have a automatic fire mode despite the small magazine.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This tac rail covered bullpup monster is supposed to be a CQB or Urban warfare weapon. Note that the Ash-12.7 does have a automatic fire mode despite the small magazine.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Maxwell Atchisson has further upgraded the USAS-12 for the 21st century.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Maxwell Atchisson has further upgraded the USAS-12 for the 21st century.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Still not quite ready for deployment, the XM29 is still a contender for the future.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The XM-29 is a combination weapon, part 20mm magazine fed grenade launcher and part 5.56mm assault rifle. Both parts are assembled into the single one-man portable unit with a built-in target acquisition / fire control system (TA/FCS).

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russian made over-and-under double barrelled shotgun in .410 bore.
ITEM.szBRDesc: One of the many finely produced sporting shotguns on the market from Baikal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Russian over-under combination gun is robust, functional, and very affordable. A 12 gauge shotgun for close-in stopping power and a .223 rifle for longer range shots.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Russian over-under combination gun is robust, functional, and very affordable. A 12 gauge shotgun for close-in stopping power and a .223 rifle for longer range shots.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Versatile pump-action shotgun manufactured by the Russian arms company Baikal.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For decades, Baikal has been designing and producing excellent shotguns.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you could dream up a new design for a semi-auto rimfire rifle, the MP161K would be it. Its light weight adjustable stock, ergonomically designed, polymer glass filled stock, and Picatinny rail are the features you dream about.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you could dream up a new design for a semi-auto rimfire rifle, the MP161K would be it. Its light weight adjustable stock, ergonomically designed, polymer glass filled stock, and Picatinny rail are the features you dream about.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Whether it is target shooting, small game hunting or just plain plinking fun the MP161K fits the bill. Now in .22 Magnum.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Whether it is target shooting, small game hunting or just plain plinking fun the MP161K fits the bill. Now in .22 Magnum.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russian made over-and-under double barrelled shotgun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: One of the many finely produced sporting shotguns on the market from Baikal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A very accurate, reliable and economically priced pistol of functional and simple design. The MCM has been used since the 1950s, and complies with all international competition standards.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A very accurate, reliable and economically priced pistol of functional and simple design. The MCM has been used since the 1950s, and complies with all international competition standards.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A more concealable version of the MCM competition pistol, Margolin is available for a less formal target shooting and self-defence applications. The barrel is shortened and original sights are simplified in this version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A more concealable version of the MCM competition pistol, Margolin is available for a less formal target shooting and self-defence applications. The barrel is shortened and original sights are simplified in this version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Barrett M82 is the ubiquitous .50 calibre anti-material rifle. A great deal of though went into this rifle to tame the recoil characteristics of the powerful .50 BMG round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Barrett M82 is the ubiquitous .50 calibre anti-material rifle. A great deal of though went into this rifle to tame the recoil characteristics of the powerful .50 BMG round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This M82A2 is a rare find. The bullpup layout retains barrel length while shortening its overall size.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This modified M82A2's bullpup layout places the action and barrel further back in the stock, retaining its barrel length while shortening its overall size.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is Barrett's compact option for .50 BMG power. The Barrett M500 stems from the demands of the Urban battlefield.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is Barrett's compact option for .50 BMG power. The Barrett M500 stems from the demands of the Urban battlefield.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A proven format, with tomorrow's heavy hitting ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: While muzzle velocity is lower than its M4 origins, the combination of Barrett's upper receiver with the heavy 6.8mm SPC round makes this a heavy hitting carbine.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A proven format, with tomorrow's heavy hitting ammunition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Depending on ammo, the M3 can switch immediately from pump-action to semi-auto or vice-versa.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M3's ability to switch firing modes is an engineering marvel well worth the expense.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M4 is a high quality shotgun, popular with police, and as a civilian self defence weapon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M4 uses an inertia recoil semi-automatic system which allows to the shooter to lock the semi-automatic action and switch to the manually operated pump-action mode and back in the matter of seconds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M4 is a high quality shotgun, popular with police, and as a civilian self defence weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The R1 is another beautiful design by Benelli, and uses ComforTech to dampen recoil. Also comes with a picatinny rail for easy scope replacements.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is a newer pistol for the venerable .32 ACP (7.65x17mm) round. Despite the relative low power of .32ACP compared to modern pistol calibres, Berretta warns against using high pressure (+P+) ammunition in the Tomcat 3032.

ITEM.szBRDesc: U.S. Army issued, the Beretta 92F is a standard 9mm Parabellum pistol, with a modified trigger-guard to allow a two-handed grip. This is a very functional weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Beretta 92FS is a slightly modified version of the Beretta 92F used by the US military.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Beretta 92FS is a slightly modified version of the Beretta 92F used by the US military. It features a chrome lined barrel, new grip panels and a lanyard ring.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 92F's leaner and meaner fully automatic machine pistol cousin.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The most pistol you'll ever need. Classified as a machine pistol, it features a fold-down front grip and an extendible steel shoulder stock, that attaches at the rear of the butt, to facilitate three-round mode shooting.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A modified version of the Beretta 92, rechambered for the .40 S&W calibre.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A modified version of the Beretta 92, rechambered for the .40 S&W calibre. Features a redesigned slide, and removable front sight blade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Look at the dazzling array of attachments for this Italian assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Yet another Kalashnikov-inspired weapon, this 5.56mm assault rifle has a quality all its own.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Love or hate the sci-fi styling, there is no denying that the Beretta U22 Neos is a very accurate plinking gun. The clean sheet modular design allows for a wealth of upgrades. This is the basic U22 Neos with a 4.5 inch barel in classic black.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This .300 WinMag bolt-action rifle uses straight-pull technology to make chambering a new round a bit faster.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Blaser R93 Tactical is another futuristic German design. It has a quick interchangeable barrel system that allows for changing barrels without the need to resight the scope. This .300 WinMag model is used widely by German and Dutch police.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Post WWII BREN guns are chambered for 7.62x51mm and can feed from the same magazines as the old British SLR (FN FAL). It remained in service with Irish Defence Force reserves until the early 21st century, and is still being marketed in India alongside modern arms.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Licensed from Ceskoslovenska Zbrojevka Brno in the 1930s and made by Enfield the BREN (BRen ENfield) served with distinction in WWII. Its relatively slow rate of fire prevented it from overheating while increasing accuracy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Licensed from Ceskoslovenska Zbrojevka Brno in the 1930s and made by Enfield the BREN (BRen ENfield) served with distinction in WWII. Its relatively slow rate of fire prevented it from overheating while increasing accuracy.

ITEM.szItemDesc: John Moses Browning designed the BAR to provide walking fire while storming the trenches of WWI. Despite being heavy, hard to control and low on magazine capacity the BAR had its fans remaining in use into the 1990s.

ITEM.szBRDesc: An oldie but goodie with a high rate of fire, this classic belt-fed LMG will answer all your offensive and defensive needs.

ITEM.szBRDesc: A Czech handgun for the famous 7.62TT round. Adopted in 1952, the CZ-52 is a powerful and accurate handgun. This weapon has been retired from general military use.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An aesthetically attractive, comfortable to handle, accurate and reliable Czech sidearm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Czech-made full-size semiautomatic pistol first appeared in 1975, intended for the export market. An aesthetically attractive, comfortable to handle, accurate and reliable sidearm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Forced by the USSR to replace the old Vz.52 pistol with a 9x18mm sidearm, the Czechs created the CZ-82, which later became the multi-calibre CZ-83. A dozen rounds vs the original Makarov's eight gives this weapon the advantage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The last rifle of empire, the .303 British, Rifle, Short, Magazine, Lee-Enfield (SMLE) served from the Boer War to beyond WWII. Relive the "mad minute" by trying to put more lead in the air than some modern automatic weapons with this classic bolt action rifle.

ITEM.szBRDesc: The FN BDA 9 is the 9mm Parabellum version of the tried and true Browning High Power semiautomatic pistol.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The High Power didn't see military service until 1935, and served on both sides in WW2.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Originally designed in 1925, the High Power didn't see military service until 1935, and was the only sidearm that served for both sides in WW2. The latest incarnation, the HP-35, is in use today in the Belgian Military.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The F2000 is a gas operated, rotating bolt, select-fire weapon. It features a forward eject system eliminating a major drawback of the fast bullpup configuration. The F2000 Tactical maximizes versatility with its many accessory rails.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The F2000 is a gas operated, rotating bolt, select-fire weapon. It features a forward eject system eliminating a major drawback of the fast bullpup configuration. The F2000 Tactical maximizes versatility with its many accessory rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the FN F2000 in its most lethal configuration. The F2000's superior ergonomics are not disturbed by the addition of advance sight and 40mm grenade launcher.
The phrase, 'Help, I've FAL-len and I can't get up,' takes on a whole new meaning when this rifle is involved.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Belgian automatic rifle set a new standard in weaponry in the early 1950's. Its robust and reliable design made it simple to use and maintain, despite its tendency for excessive climbing in automatic mode.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A smaller, more versatile version of the widely used Fusil Automatique Leger.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The original "Right Arm Of The Free World", without the weight. Grab this 7.62mm spewing baby if you like your extreme prejudice on a diet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Five-seveN is a delayed blowback operated, semi-automatic firearm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: FN's Five-seveN pistol was designed as a complimentary sidearm for the P90 submachine-gun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A red headed bastard step child of the Eastern AK-47 and the Western M-16, this Belgian beauty has an integral flash suppressor and a Swedish twin. In the words of Gershwin, who could ask for anything more... besides a lighter trigger pull.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Developed in the early 50s, and still widely used today, the MAG will work in the worst of conditions.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nail your enemies to the walls with the FN MAG. With a fire rate of 950 rounds per minute, you can draw a deadly line of fire everywhere you need it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This light machine gun has been known to moonlight as a beefed-up assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reputed for its reliability, this Belgian machine gun is gas operated, with a simple rotating bolt system. Its design was adopted by the US Army as the M249 machine gun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Hydraulic buffer system, RIS sight mount, and 20 years of US Army experience sets the Product Improvement Program apart from its predecessor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Nicknamed 'The Bugle,' here is the utility of a M16 in under three feet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The French Army's FA-MAS rifle was the first 'bullpup' design to enter military service. It handles well, and shoots quite accurately. A bipod can also be attached for steadier shooting.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Austrian semi-automatic pistol popularized many features found on modern side arms.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Even though most of this Austrian pistol's parts are plastic, it will get detected by airport x-ray machines. The simple design of this recoil operated self-loader contains only 32 components, and is a common army issue worldwide.

ITEM.szItemDesc: As the fully automatic version of the Glock 17, this Austrian pistol was specifically designed for military use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Of Austrian origin, the Glock 18 is deserving of the classification of machine pistol. As the Glock 17's successor, it was built to offer the option for automatic fire. Sorry, but parts from the Glock 17 and 18 are not interchangeable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A slightly more compact version of the model 17, the model 19 gives you the same reliable 9mm Glock action.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A slightly more compact version of the model 17, the model 19 gives you the same reliable 9mm Glock action.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In some contries the .380ACP Glock 25 substitutes for Glocks firing "military" rounds like 9x19mm. In the US the Glock 25 is only imported for law enforcement and military users - odd how that works.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The world's first polymer pistol. Revolutionary for its time, the Heckler & Koch Volks Pistole model 70 in its military variant can be transformed into a machine pistol by simply attaching its combination stock / holster.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The world's first polymer pistol. Revolutionary for its time, the Heckler & Koch Volks Pistole model 70 in its military variant can be transformed into a machine pistol by simply attaching its combination stock / holster.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Compared to the XM29, the XM25 dispenses with the complexity and weight of having an integrated Kinetic Energy weapon, and is purely a magazine fed, multi-shot grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Who needs bullets when you have grenades? The XM-25 is the stand alone magazine fed grenade system spawned by the revamped US OICW program. For the enemies of freedom, there is still nowhere to hide.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A contender to replace the M16.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The new XM-8 family of weapons is spearheading the "next gen" infantry weapons movement, after the OICW contract went belly up.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The barrel, stock and furniture needed to produce the baseline XM8 for mass deployment. Despite the XM8 program being shelved, a small production run has allowed private security firms to get some time in the field with this advanced small arms family.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The barrel, stock and furniture needed to produce the baseline XM8 for mass deployment. Despite the XM8 program being shelved, a small production run has allowed private security firms to get some time in the field with this advanced small arms family.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A contender to replace the M16, this is the PDW variant.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Compact is a shorty version of the XM-8, outfitted specifically for short range engagements, notably urban ops.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The short barrel, stock and furniture needed to produce a M8 compact enough to be wielded one handed. Despite the XM8 program being shelved, a small production run has allowed private security firms to get some time in the field with this advanced small arms family.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The short barrel, stock and furniture needed to produce a M8 compact enough to be wielded one handed. Despite the XM8 program being shelved, a small production run has allowed private security firms to get some time in the field with this advanced small arms family.

ITEM.szBRDesc: The Heavy Barrel (HBAR) XM8 is equipped with an advanced sighting module that can quickly switch between DMR and LMG modes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The heavy barrel, stock and furniture needed to produce a weapon suitable for both DMR and volume suppressive fire. Despite the XM8 program being shelved, a small production run has allowed private security firms to get some time in the field with this advanced small arms family.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The legendary caseless firearm still waiting to be the weapon of the future.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Germany's Heckler and Koch designed this weapon as the fastest automatic rifle around. Its high velocity shots tear right through Kevlar. Despite its unusual appearance, it is very comfortable to use and shoots extremely accurately.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed by Aimo Lahti, this accurate if heavy SMG is a well-made, elementary blowback weapon. In appearance it is very similar to the German Bergmann MP34 and the Soviet PPD 1934G/38G and PPSh41 which it inspired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Suomi was used with great success during the war of 1940 against the Soviet Union, demonstrating the importance of SMGs to modern warfare. Manufacture of the Suomi ceased in 1944, but Finland used it well into the 1990s.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The effect of this Russian bolt-action anti-material rifle on the enemy: a bloody mess.

ITEM.szBRDesc: This WWII era classic was meant for second-line troops, in concept the M1 Carbine was a forerunner of the Personal Defence Weapon. Surplus M1 Carbines have flooded the civilian market.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A Rugged and dependable semi-automatic, just watch your thumbs when reloading.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The first self-loading rifle to be adopted by any army, the M1 has seen service from Normandy and Guadalcanal to the Chosin Reservoir and Khe Sahn and beyond.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M14 is about as All-American as apple pie and the 4th of July. Any A-Team equipped with this rifle is gunning for victory.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Truly American through and through. This lighter automatic rifle offers multiple firing options, but is best kept locked at semi-automatic. Unfortunately, without the ability to change its barrel, it can overheat with sustained firing.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the M14 barrel and action dropped into a new stock with Picatinny Rails, to take advantage of more modern add-ons.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M21 tactical rifle is the sniper version of the M14. An accurate rifle with good stopping power. Somebody dropped this one into the EBR-stock that was originally meant for the M14 rifle.
